TFTTutorial_Augment_BackRowAS1.name: Swift Strike
TFTTutorial_Augment_BackRowAS1.description: Combat start: Your champions in the back 2 rows gain 20 Attack Speed.

TFTTutorial_Augment_FrontRowHealth1.name: Bulwark
TFTTutorial_Augment_FrontRowHealth1.description: Combat start: Your champions in the front 2 rows gain 100 Health.

TFTTutorial_Augment_FrontRowMana1.name: Splash Zone
TFTTutorial_Augment_FrontRowMana1.description: Combat start: Your champions in the front 2 rows gain 20 Mana.

TFTTutorial_Augment_WithItemAS2.name: Elite Vanguard
TFTTutorial_Augment_WithItemAS2.description: Your champions holding an item gain 20 Attack Speed.

TFTTutorial_Augment_WithItemHealth2.name: Cybernetic Mass
TFTTutorial_Augment_WithItemHealth2.description: Your champions holding an item gain 300 Health.

TFTTutorial_Augment_WithoutItemAS2.name: Unhindered
TFTTutorial_Augment_WithoutItemAS2.description: Your champions without items gain 55 Attack Speed.

TFT15_Augment_BastionCirclet.name: Bastion Circlet
TFT15_Augment_BastionCirclet.description: Gain a Bastion Emblem, a Giant's Belt, and a Leona.

TFT15_Augment_BattleAcademiaCirclet.name: Battle Academia Circlet
TFT15_Augment_BattleAcademiaCirclet.description: Gain a Battle Academia Emblem and a Rakan.

TFT15_Augment_BattleAcademiaCrown.name: Battle Academia Crown
TFT15_Augment_BattleAcademiaCrown.description: Gain a Battle Academia Emblem, a Spirit Visage, and a Garen.

TFT15_Augment_CrystalRoseCirclet.name: Crystal Gambit Circlet
TFT15_Augment_CrystalRoseCirclet.description: Gain a Crystal Gambit Emblem and a Janna.

TFT15_Augment_CrystalRoseCrown.name: Crystal Gambit Crown
TFT15_Augment_CrystalRoseCrown.description: Gain a Crystal Gambit Emblem, an Adaptive Helm, and a Janna.

TFT15_Augment_ChallengerCirclet.name: Duelist Circlet
TFT15_Augment_ChallengerCirclet.description: Gain a Duelist Emblem, an Ashe, and a BF Sword.

TFT15_Augment_ChallengerCrown.name: Duelist Crown
TFT15_Augment_ChallengerCrown.description: Gain a Duelist Emblem, a Kraken's Fury, and a Gangplank.

TFT15_Augment_DestroyerCirclet.name: Executioner Circlet
TFT15_Augment_DestroyerCirclet.description: Gain an Executioner Emblem, an Akali, and a Sparring Gloves.

TFT15_Augment_DestroyerCrown.name: Executioner Crown
TFT15_Augment_DestroyerCrown.description: Gain a Executioner Emblem, a Striker's Flail, and a Katarina.

TFT15_Augment_EdgelordCrown.name: Edgelord Crown
TFT15_Augment_EdgelordCrown.description: Gain an Edgelord Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Yasuo.

TFT15_Augment_EdgelordCirclet.name: Edgelord Circlet
TFT15_Augment_EdgelordCirclet.description: Gain an Edgelord Emblem, a Samira, and a Recurve Bow.

TFT15_Augment_EmpyreanCirclet.name: Wraith Circlet
TFT15_Augment_EmpyreanCirclet.description: Gain a Wraith Emblem and a K'Sante.

TFT15_Augment_EmpyreanCrown.name: Wraith Crown
TFT15_Augment_EmpyreanCrown.description: Gain a Wraith Emblem, a Hextech Gunblade, and a Malzahar.

TFT15_Augment_HeavyweightCirclet.name: Heavyweight Circlet
TFT15_Augment_HeavyweightCirclet.description: Gain a Heavyweight Emblem, a Poppy, and a Giant's Belt.

TFT15_Augment_RingKingCirclet.name: Luchador Circlet
TFT15_Augment_RingKingCirclet.description: Gain a Luchador Emblem and a Dr Mundo.

TFT15_Augment_RingKingCrown.name: Luchador Crown
TFT15_Augment_RingKingCrown.description: Gain a Luchador Emblem, a Sterak's Gage, and a Dr Mundo.

TFT15_Augment_SpellslingerCirclet.name: Sorcerer Circlet
TFT15_Augment_SpellslingerCirclet.description: Gain an Sorcerer Emblem, a Karma, and a Tear of the Goddess.

TFT15_Augment_SpellslingerCrown.name: Sorcerer Crown
TFT15_Augment_SpellslingerCrown.description: Gain a Sorcerer Emblem, a Jeweled Gauntlet, and an Ahri.

TFT15_Augment_ProdigyCirclet.name: Prodigy Circlet
TFT15_Augment_ProdigyCirclet.description: Gain a Prodigy Emblem, a Malzahar, and a Needlessly Large Rod.

TFT15_Augment_ProdigyCrown.name: Prodigy Crown
TFT15_Augment_ProdigyCrown.description: Gain a Prodigy Emblem, a Spear of Shojin, and an Ezreal.

TFT15_Augment_ProtectorCirclet.name: Protector Circlet
TFT15_Augment_ProtectorCirclet.description: Gain a Protector Emblem, a Neeko, and a Giant's Belt.

TFT15_Augment_ProtectorCrown.name: Protector Crown
TFT15_Augment_ProtectorCrown.description: Gain a Protector Emblem, a Protector's Vow, and a Neeko.

TFT15_Augment_JuggernautCirclet.name: Juggernaut Circlet
TFT15_Augment_JuggernautCirclet.description: Gain a Juggernaut Emblem, an Udyr, and a Giant's Belt.

TFT15_Augment_SoulFighterCirclet.name: Soul Fighter Circlet
TFT15_Augment_SoulFighterCirclet.description: Gain a Soul Fighter Emblem and a Kalista.

TFT15_Augment_SoulFighterCrown.name: Soul Fighter Crown
TFT15_Augment_SoulFighterCrown.description: Gain a Soul Fighter Emblem, a Spear of Shojin, and a Kalista.

TFT15_Augment_StarGuardianCrown.name: Star Guardian Crown
TFT15_Augment_StarGuardianCrown.description: Gain a Star Guardian Emblem, a Steadfast Heart, and a Rell.

TFT15_Augment_StarGuardianCirclet.name: Star Guardian Circlet
TFT15_Augment_StarGuardianCirclet.description: Gain a Star Guardian Emblem and a Rell.

TFT15_Augment_SupremeCellsCirclet.name: Supreme Cells Circlet
TFT15_Augment_SupremeCellsCirclet.description: Gain a Supreme Cells Emblem and an Akali.

TFT15_Augment_SupremeCellsCrown.name: Supreme Cells Crown
TFT15_Augment_SupremeCellsCrown.description: Gain a Supreme Cells Emblem, a Last Whisper, and a Kai'sa.

TFT15_Augment_ZacCarry.name: Perfect Form
TFT15_Augment_ZacCarry.description: Gain a Zac. Your strongest Zac becomes a Specialist. He now bounces around the battlefield dealing damage in a one hex radius.

TFT15_Augment_DrMundoCarry.name: Give 'em the Chair!
TFT15_Augment_DrMundoCarry.description: Gain a Dr. Mundo. Your strongest Dr. Mundo becomes a Ranged Marksman. He now throws chairs that deal heavy damage, but cost Health.

TFT15_Augment_BattleAcademia_ClassPresid.name: Class President
TFT15_Augment_BattleAcademia_ClassPresid.description: Combat start: Powered Up Battle Academia champions and allies adjacent to one gain 70 Health, 8% AD, and 8% AP. Battle Academia units gain double. Gain a Katarina

TFT15_Augment_BattleAcademia_TransferStu.name: Transfer Students
TFT15_Augment_BattleAcademia_TransferStu.description: At the start of every stage and after every carousel round, gain 2 random 1-3 cost Battle Academia champions. Gain an Ezreal.

TFT15_Augment_BattleAcademia_Hero101.name: Hero 101
TFT15_Augment_BattleAcademia_Hero101.description: The first time you win 4 player combats (Wins: <placeholder>), all Battle Academia champions gain 100 Health and 15% reduced max Mana. Gain a Garen and Ezreal.

TFT15_Augment_StarGuardian_TinyTeam.name: Tiny Team
TFT15_Augment_StarGuardian_TinyTeam.description: When you field 3 or less Star Guardians, increase Star Guardian bonuses by an additional 100%. Gain a Syndra and Rell.

TFT15_Augment_StarGuardian_PowerOfFriend.name: Power of Friendship
TFT15_Augment_StarGuardian_PowerOfFriend.description: Star Guardians who start combat adjacent to at least one other Star Guardian gain 1 Mana Regeneration, 20 Armor, and 20 Magic Resist. Gain a Rell.

TFT15_Augment_Luchador_TournamentTitans.name: Tournament Titans
TFT15_Augment_Luchador_TournamentTitans.description:
Luchadors gain 5% Attack Speed. Whenever you win player combats, Luchadors grow in size and permanently gain 2% Attack Damage and 20 Health. Gain a Dr Mundo and Gnar.

(Total: % AD; Health)

TFT15_Augment_TheCrew_EscapeVelocity.name: Escape Velocity
TFT15_Augment_TheCrew_EscapeVelocity.description:
Gain 1 Velocity per reroll, and 10 when you level up. Crew units gain 1% Attack Speed for every 3 Velocity.

(Velocity: )

TFT15_Augment_Sniper_PreciseShot.name: Precise Shot
TFT15_Augment_Sniper_PreciseShot.description: Every 4 seconds, all Sniper champions fire a shot that deals 85% of their Basic Attack Damage to the lowest health enemy in range. Gain a Jhin.

TFT15_Augment_SniperCrown.name: Sniper Crown
TFT15_Augment_SniperCrown.description: Gain a Sniper Emblem, an Infinity Edge, and a Caitlyn.

TFT15_Augment_SniperCirclet.name: Sniper Circlet
TFT15_Augment_SniperCirclet.description: Gain a Sniper Emblem, a Jinx, and a Recurve Bow.

TFT_Augment_AimForTheTop.name: Aim For The Top!
TFT_Augment_AimForTheTop.description:
You are more likely to fight stronger players, and you know who you will fight. When you lose, gain 2 XP. After your first win and every 3 wins after, gain a component.

Foes vanquished:

TFT15_Augment_MalphiteCarry.name: Tectonic Titan
TFT15_Augment_MalphiteCarry.description: Gain a Malphite. Your strongest Malphite becomes a Fighter, gaining increased Attack Speed. He now charges at nearby enemies, knocking them up and dealing heavy damage.

TFT15_Augment_MightyMech_PowerUpload.name: Power Upload
TFT15_Augment_MightyMech_PowerUpload.description:
You can give the Mighty Mech a Power Up. When it has Power Up the Mighty Mech gains 150 Health and 10% Damage Amp.

Gain an Aatrox, a Senna, and a Power Remover.

TFT15_Augment_TheCrew_SpaceCamp.name: Space Camp
TFT15_Augment_TheCrew_SpaceCamp.description: Whenever you upgrade a 1-cost Crew champion, gain a random 1-3 cost Crew champion. Gain a Malphite.

TFT15_Augment_SoulFighter_TheGodsEyeOpen.name: The God's Eye Opens
TFT15_Augment_SoulFighter_TheGodsEyeOpen.description: Every 4 seconds the God's Eye grants a random Soul Fighter 200 shield and 12% stacking Attack Speed for the rest of combat. Gain a Kalista and Naafiri.

TFT15_Augment_Mentor_TeachersCouncil.name: Teacher's Council
TFT15_Augment_Mentor_TeachersCouncil.description: Mentor bonuses are granted to your team regardless of how many Mentors you play. Gain a Kobuko.

TFT15_Augment_Wraith_DeepeningShadows.name: Deepening Shadows
TFT15_Augment_Wraith_DeepeningShadows.description: At combat start and whenever the Shadow Realm strikes, Wraith champions gain 6% Attack Damage and 6% Ability Power. Gain a Jhin and Zac.

TFT15_Augment_Wraith_ShadowHomunculous.name: The Darkness Within
TFT15_Augment_Wraith_ShadowHomunculous.description: The first 3 Wraith champions to die each combat summon a monstrosity from the Shadow Realm. Gain a Jhin and Zac.

TFT15_Augment_GarenCarry.name: Schoolyard Justice
TFT15_Augment_GarenCarry.description: Gain a Garen. Your strongest Garen becomes a Fighter. He no longer Heals, but deals more damage and executes weak enemies.

TFT15_Augment_Duelist_AdaptiveStyle.name: Adaptive Style
TFT15_Augment_Duelist_AdaptiveStyle.description: On attack, Duelists gain 2% Attack Damage and Ability Power, stacking up to 15 times. Duelist Tanks instead gain 2 Armor and Magic Resist. Gain a Kai'Sa and Kayle.

TFT15_Augment_NeekoCarry.name: Starfall
TFT15_Augment_NeekoCarry.description: Gain a Neeko. Your strongest Neeko becomes a Magic Fighter and gains increased Attack Speed. Her Ability deals more damage, and increases its radius with every cast.

TFT15_Augment_Sorcerer_DazzlingDisplay.name: Dazzling Display
TFT15_Augment_Sorcerer_DazzlingDisplay.description: Enemies who take damage from Sorcerer Abilities deal 20% less damage for 6 seconds. Gain a Lux and a Lucian.

TFT15_Augment_Heavyweight_RingTheBell.name: Ring The Bell
TFT15_Augment_Heavyweight_RingTheBell.description: After 15 seconds, your Heavyweight champions gain 30% max Health and 20% Damage Amp. Gain a Kobuko and a Zac.

TFT15_Augment_SupremeCells_AllForOne.name: The Strongest Survive
TFT15_Augment_SupremeCells_AllForOne.description: Whenever an ally dies, they grant the Supreme Cell with the most damage this round 8% of their maximum health. Gain a Kai'Sa and Kennen.

TFT15_Augment_Protector_PreemptiveProtec.name: Preemptive Protection
TFT15_Augment_Protector_PreemptiveProtec.description: Combat start: Protectors shield themselves and their closest ally for 18% of their maximum health. Shields stack. Gain a Rakan.

TFT15_Augment_Executioner_GoldenGuilloti.name: Golden Guillotine
TFT15_Augment_Executioner_GoldenGuilloti.description: Executioner kills have a chance to drop loot, scaling with Critical Strike Chance. The value of the loot given can also critically strike, granting even more loot. Gain a Katarina and Kalista.

TFT_Augment_SoloLeveling.name: Solo Leveling
TFT_Augment_SoloLeveling.description: For the next 5 combats, your team size is 1 but the champion you field has massively increased stats. Gain 1 XP for every kill they get. Afterwards, gain 2 item components.

TFT15_Augment_Mentor_LearnFromTheBest.name: Learn From The Best
TFT15_Augment_Mentor_LearnFromTheBest.description: Whenever you star-up a champion they permanently gain 50% of every unique Mentor bonus of Mentors on your board or bench. Gain a Yasuo.

TFT15_Augment_Bastion_RaidBoss.name: Raid Boss
TFT15_Augment_Bastion_RaidBoss.description: Your strongest Bastion champion gains 20% max Health. When other Bastions die, they transfer 20% of their Armor and Magic Resist to it. Gain a Shen and Rell.

TFT15_Augment_SoulFighter_TournamentFavo.name: Tournament Favorites
TFT15_Augment_SoulFighter_TournamentFavo.description:
Soul Fighters gain Fame when they deal damage. Each Fame breakpoint grants loot. Gain a Naafiri and Kalista.

Fame: /

TFT15_Augment_Juggernaut_Indomitable.name: Unceasing
TFT15_Augment_Juggernaut_Indomitable.description: Whenever an ally Juggernaut dies, all other Juggernauts gain a 10% max Health shield for 5 seconds and gain 2% more Durability. Gain an Aatrox and Dr. Mundo.

TFT15_Augment_KennenCarry.name: Nine Thousand Volts
TFT15_Augment_KennenCarry.description: Gain a Kennen. Your strongest Kennen becomes a ranged Marksman. He throws piercing Shurikens that can stun and deal magic damage.

TFT15_Augment_ShenCarry.name: Twilight Assault
TFT15_Augment_ShenCarry.description: Gain a Shen. Your strongest Shen becomes a ranged Marksman gaining +3 Range. His ability no longer shields but instead deals additional damage.

TFT15_Augment_ViCarry.name: Knuckledusters
TFT15_Augment_ViCarry.description: Gain a Vi. Your strongest Vi becomes an Attack Fighter and has a chance to drop loot on kill. She now deals heavy single target damage and gains Attack Damage for item components equipped on your team.

TFT15_Augment_UdyrCarry.name: Burning Bright
TFT15_Augment_UdyrCarry.description: Gain an Udyr. Your strongest Udyr becomes an Attack Fighter and sends bouncing gusts of flame out with every attack. His spell no longer rapidly attacks, but instead grants him stacking Attack Speed.

TFT15_Augment_Strategist_GamePlan.name: Game Plan
TFT15_Augment_Strategist_GamePlan.description: Mark 1 hex per Strategist fielded. Allies standing in marked hexes gain 150 Health and 10% Damage Amp, Strategists gain 100% more. Gain a Janna and Ziggs.

TFT_Augment_Isekai_Prodigy.name: Isekai
TFT_Augment_Isekai_Prodigy.description: Summon a magical hero from another universe to fight for you. This hero is a Prodigy this game.

TFT_Augment_Isekai_Sorcerer.name: Isekai
TFT_Augment_Isekai_Sorcerer.description: Summon a magical hero from another universe to fight for you. This hero is a  <TFTRadiantItemBonus>Sorcerer</TFTRadiantItemBonus> this game.

TFT_Augment_Isekai_Strategist.name: Isekai
TFT_Augment_Isekai_Strategist.description: Summon a magical hero from another universe to fight for you. This hero is a Strategist this game.

TFT15_Augment_StrategistCirclet.name: Strategist Circlet
TFT15_Augment_StrategistCirclet.description: Gain a Strategist Emblem, a Ziggs, and a Tear of the Goddess.

TFT15_Augment_Luchador_GrandSlam.name: Grand Slam
TFT15_Augment_Luchador_GrandSlam.description: Luchadors gain 10% Attack Speed. When Luchador is active, Luchadors leap into battle at combat start. Luchador leaps deal 300% of their Basic Attack Damage. Gain a Dr. Mundo.

TFT15_Augment_SentaiRanger_BeTheHead_Gol.name: I'll Be The Head
TFT15_Augment_SentaiRanger_BeTheHead_Gol.description:
The Mighty Mech gains 25% Attack Speed. Gain a Gangplank.

Field 7 Mighty Mech with a total of 14 Star Levels and reach level 10 to activate MECHA-MERGE PROTOCOL.

TFT15_Augment_SentaiRanger_BeTheHead.name: I'll Be The Head
TFT15_Augment_SentaiRanger_BeTheHead.description:
The Mighty Mech gains 45% Attack Speed. Gain a 3 Mighty Mech Champions.

Field 7 Mighty Mech with a total of 14 Star Levels and reach level 10 to activate MECHA-MERGE PROTOCOL.

TFT6_Augment_PortableForge.name: Portable Forge
TFT6_Augment_PortableForge.description:
Choose 1 of 4 Artifacts.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

TFT6_Augment_Recombobulator.name: Recombobulator
TFT6_Augment_Recombobulator.description: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions 1 cost tier higher (max 5). Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

TFT7_Augment_LivingForge.name: Living Forge
TFT7_Augment_LivingForge.description:
Gain an Artifact anvil now and after every 10 player combats.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

TFT6_Augment_GachaAddict.name: Prismatic Ticket
TFT6_Augment_GachaAddict.description: Each time your Shop is rerolled, you have a 50% chance to gain a free reroll.

TFT9_Augment_YoungAndWildAndFree.name: Young and Wild and Free
TFT9_Augment_YoungAndWildAndFree.description: You can always move freely on Carousel rounds. Gain 5 gold.

TFT9_Augment_LongTimeCrafting.name: Latent Forge
TFT9_Augment_LongTimeCrafting.description:
After 8 player combats, gain an Artifact anvil.

The anvil offers 4 choices. Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

TFT9_Augment_CustomerIsAlwaysRight.name: Component Buffet
TFT9_Augment_CustomerIsAlwaysRight.description:
Whenever you would get a component, gain a component anvil instead. Gain a random component now.

The anvil offers 4 choices.

TFT9_Augment_IronAssets.name: Iron Assets
TFT9_Augment_IronAssets.description: Gain a component anvil and 3 gold.

TFT9_Augment_MissedConnections.name: Missed Connections
TFT9_Augment_MissedConnections.description: Gain a copy of each 1-cost champion.

TFT9_Augment_RollTheDice.name: Radiant Rascal
TFT9_Augment_RollTheDice.description:
Gain a Rascal's Gloves item. This equips 2 random Radiant items every round.

Radiant items are very powerful versions of completed items.

TFT9_Augment_BuildingACollectionPlusPlus.name: Buried Treasures
TFT9_Augment_BuildingACollectionPlusPlus.description: Gain a random item component now and at the start of the next 5 rounds.

TFT6_Augment_PandorasItems.name: Pandora's Items
TFT6_Augment_PandorasItems.description:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

Gain 1 random component.

TFT9_Augment_PandorasRadiantBox.name: Pandora's Items III
TFT9_Augment_PandorasRadiantBox.description:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

Gain 1 random Radiant item.

TFT9_Augment_PandorasItems2.name: Pandora's Items II
TFT9_Augment_PandorasItems2.description:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

Gain 2 random components.

TFT9_Augment_ArmyBuilding.name: Team Building
TFT9_Augment_ArmyBuilding.description:
Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator. Gain another after 5 player combats.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

TFT9_Augment_RiskyMoves.name: Risky Moves
TFT9_Augment_RiskyMoves.description: Your Tactician loses 20 Health, but after 7 player combats, gain 30 gold.

TFT6_Augment_OneTwoFive.name: One, Two, Five!
TFT6_Augment_OneTwoFive.description: Gain 1 random component, 2 gold, and 1 random 5-cost champion.

TFT9_Augment_PumpingUp.name: Pumping Up I
TFT9_Augment_PumpingUp.description: Your team gains 6% Attack Speed. After each round, they gain 0.5% more. (Current Attack Speed: <placeholder>%)

TFT9_Augment_PumpingUp2.name: Pumping Up II
TFT9_Augment_PumpingUp2.description: Your team gains 10% Attack Speed. After each round, they gain 1% more. (Current Attack Speed: <placeholder>%)

TFT9_Augment_PumpingUp3.name: Pumping Up III
TFT9_Augment_PumpingUp3.description: Your team gains 16% Attack Speed. After each round, they gain 2% more. (Current Attack Speed: <placeholder>%)

TFT6_Augment_TradeSector.name: Trade Sector
TFT6_Augment_TradeSector.description: Gain a free Shop reroll every round. Gain 4 gold.

TFT6_Augment_MaxLevel10.name: Level Up!
TFT6_Augment_MaxLevel10.description: When you buy XP, gain an additional 2. Gain 12 immediately.

TFT9_Augment_LearningFromExperience2.name: Patient Study
TFT9_Augment_LearningFromExperience2.description: After player combat, gain 2 XP if you won or 3 XP if you lost.

TFT6_Augment_RadiantRelics.name: Radiant Relics
TFT6_Augment_RadiantRelics.description:
Choose 1 of 5 Radiant items. Gain a Magnetic Remover.

Radiant items are very powerful versions of completed items.

TFT7_Augment_LategameSpecialist.name: Late Game Specialist
TFT7_Augment_LategameSpecialist.description: When you reach Level 9, gain 36 gold.

TFT9_Augment_HighEndSector.name: Shopping Spree
TFT9_Augment_HighEndSector.description: When you level up, gain a number of free shop refreshes equal to your level+1. Gain 2 gold.

TFT9_Augment_BardPlaybook1.name: Caretaker's Ally
TFT9_Augment_BardPlaybook1.description:
Gain a random 2-cost champion now. Gain the same one again every time you level up.

Champion:

TFT9_Augment_BardPlaybook2.name: Caretaker's Favor
TFT9_Augment_BardPlaybook2.description:
Gain a component anvil when you reach level 5, 6, 7, and 8.

The anvil offers 4 choices.

TFT9_Augment_BardPlaybook3.name: Caretaker's Chosen
TFT9_Augment_BardPlaybook3.description:
As you level, gain more powerful items.
Level 4: Component anvil
Level 6: Completed item anvil
Level 8: Choose 1 of 5 Radiant items

TFT10_Augment_HeroicGrabBag.name: Heroic Grab Bag
TFT10_Augment_HeroicGrabBag.description:
Gain 2 Lesser Champion Duplicators and 5 gold.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

TFT6_Augment_ClearMind.name: Clear Mind
TFT6_Augment_ClearMind.description: If there are no champions on your bench at the end of player combat, gain 3 XP.

TFT7_Augment_ClutteredMind.name: Cluttered Mind
TFT7_Augment_ClutteredMind.description: Gain 4 random 1-cost champions now. If your bench is full at the end of player combat, gain 3 XP.

TFT10_Augment_GoingLong.name: Going Long
TFT10_Augment_GoingLong.description:
You no longer gain interest. Gain 12 gold now. Round start: gain 5 XP.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

TFT10_Augment_Scapegoat.name: Scapegoat
TFT10_Augment_Scapegoat.description: Gain a Training Dummy and 4 gold. If it is the first to die each player combat, gain 1 gold.

TFT10_Augment_GoodForSomethingSilver.name: Good For Something I
TFT10_Augment_GoodForSomethingSilver.description: Champions that aren't holding items have a 50% chance to drop 1 gold on death.

TFT7_Augment_LuckyGloves.name: Lucky Gloves
TFT7_Augment_LuckyGloves.description: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 2 Sparring Gloves.

TFT7_Augment_LuckyGlovesPlus.name: Lucky Gloves+
TFT7_Augment_LuckyGlovesPlus.description: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 2 Sparring Gloves now, then another after 2 player combats.

TFT9_Augment_TiniestTitanPlus.name: Tiniest Titan
TFT9_Augment_TiniestTitanPlus.description: Gain 2 player Health and 2 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster. Gain 15 gold now.

TFT9_Augment_Commander_TeamingUp1.name: Teaming Up
TFT9_Augment_Commander_TeamingUp1.description: Gain 1 random component and 2 random 3-cost champions.

TFT9_Augment_BigGrabBag.name: Big Grab Bag
TFT9_Augment_BigGrabBag.description:
Gain 3 random components, 2 gold, and 1 Reforger.

Reforgers allow you to remake any item.

TFT10_Augment_LittleBuddies.name: Little Buddies
TFT10_Augment_LittleBuddies.description: Your 4-cost and 5-cost champions gain 55 Health and 6% Attack Speed for every 1-cost and 2-cost champion on your board.

TFT11_Augment_RainingGold.name: Raining Gold
TFT11_Augment_RainingGold.description: Gain 7 gold now and 1 gold every round.

TFT11_Augment_RainingGoldPlus.name: Raining Gold+
TFT11_Augment_RainingGoldPlus.description: Gain 18 gold now and 1 gold every round.

TFT_Augment_WorthTheWaitPrismatic.name: Worth the Wait II
TFT_Augment_WorthTheWaitPrismatic.description:
Gain 2 copies of a random 2-cost champion. Gain another copy of them at the start of each round for the rest of the game.

Champion:

TFT_Augment_WorthTheWaitGold.name: Worth the Wait
TFT_Augment_WorthTheWaitGold.description:
Gain a random 1-cost champion. After 2 rounds, gain another copy of them at the start of each round for the rest of the game.

Champion:

TFT11_Augment_RadiantRefactor.name: Radiant Refactor
TFT11_Augment_RadiantRefactor.description:
Gain a Masterwork Upgrade and 1 component anvil.

Masterwork Upgrade upgrades an item to Radiant!

TFT11_Augment_Prizefighter.name: Prizefighter
TFT11_Augment_Prizefighter.description: Gain 2 item components. Every 5 wins gives you an item component.

TFT11_Augment_Calltochaos.name: Call to Chaos
TFT11_Augment_Calltochaos.description:
Gain a powerful and random reward.

Reward:

TFT11_Augment_Slammin.name: Slammin'
TFT11_Augment_Slammin.description: Gain 1 random component(s). After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than consumables), gain 2 XP.

TFT11_Augment_Slammin_Plus.name: Slammin'+
TFT11_Augment_Slammin_Plus.description: Gain 1 random component(s) and 10 XP now. After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than consumables), gain 2 XP.

TFT11_Augment_ScoreboardScrapper.name: Scoreboard Scrapper
TFT11_Augment_ScoreboardScrapper.description: Every round, if you're in the bottom 4, your team permanently gains 1.5% Attack Damage and Ability Power. If you're in the Top 4, they have 10% more Health.

TFT11_Augment_BloodBank.name: Lunch Money
TFT11_Augment_BloodBank.description:
Every 7 damage you deal to enemy tacticians gives you 2 gold.
Total Payouts: Gold

TFT11_Augment_OverEncumbered.name: Over Encumbered
TFT11_Augment_OverEncumbered.description: For the next stage, you only get 2 bench slots. After, get 2 item components.

TFT11_Augment_Epoch.name: Epoch
TFT11_Augment_Epoch.description: Now, and at the start of every stage, gain 4 XP and 3 free rerolls.

TFT11_Augment_EpochPlus.name: Epoch+
TFT11_Augment_EpochPlus.description: Now, and at the start of every stage, gain 8 XP and 3 free rerolls.

TFT11_Augment_Reinfourcement.name: ReinFOURcement
TFT11_Augment_Reinfourcement.description: The next 4-cost champion you buy with gold is instantly upgraded to 2-star. Gain 12 gold.

TFT11_Augment_Buildabud.name: Build a Bud!
TFT11_Augment_Buildabud.description: Gain a random 3-star 1-cost champion. Gain 8 gold.

TFT9_Augment_DravenSpoilsOfWar.name: Spoils of War I
TFT9_Augment_DravenSpoilsOfWar.description: Enemies have a 25% chance to drop loot when killed.

TFT9_Augment_DravenSpoilsOfWar2.name: Spoils of War II
TFT9_Augment_DravenSpoilsOfWar2.description: Enemies have a 30% chance to drop loot when killed.

TFT9_Augment_DravenSpoilsOfWar3.name: Spoils of War III
TFT9_Augment_DravenSpoilsOfWar3.description: Enemies have a 45% chance to drop loot when killed.

TFT_Augment_CalledShot.name: Called Shot
TFT_Augment_CalledShot.description: Set your win streak to 4. Gain 4 gold.

TFT9_Augment_AllThatShimmers.name: All That Shimmers
TFT9_Augment_AllThatShimmers.description: Choose a gold-generating Artifact item and gain a Magnetic Remover.

TFT_Augment_Flexible.name: Flexible
TFT_Augment_Flexible.description: Gain 1 random Emblem. At the start of every Stage, gain a random Emblem. Your team gains 20 Health for each Emblem they are holding.

TFT_Augment_AllThatShimmersPlus.name: All That Shimmers+
TFT_Augment_AllThatShimmersPlus.description: Choose a gold-generating Artifact. Gain a Magnetic Remover and 4 gold.

TFT_Augment_RestartMission.name: Restart Mission
TFT_Augment_RestartMission.description: Remove all champions on your board and bench. Gain 2 random 2-star 3-costs, 3 2-star 2-costs, and 1 2-star 1-cost champion.

TFT_Augment_ThornPlatedArmor.name: Thorn-Plated Armor
TFT_Augment_ThornPlatedArmor.description: Gain a Bramble Vest. Your Bramble Vests deal 20-210% more damage (based on Stage).

TFT_Augment_Placebo.name: Placebo
TFT_Augment_Placebo.description: Your team gains 1% Attack Speed. Gain 8 gold.

TFT_Augment_UpwardMobility.name: Upward Mobility
TFT_Augment_UpwardMobility.description: Buying XP costs 1 less. Gain 2 Health and 2 free rerolls whenever you level up.

TFT_Augment_PatienceIsAVirtue.name: Patience is a Virtue
TFT_Augment_PatienceIsAVirtue.description: Each round, gain 2 free rerolls if you did not buy a champion last round.

TFT_Augment_ShimmerscaleEssence.name: Shimmerscale Essence
TFT_Augment_ShimmerscaleEssence.description:
Gain a Mogul's Mail. In 5 rounds, gain a Gamblers Blade.

These items give gold as well as combat power.

TFT_Augment_HighVoltage.name: High Voltage
TFT_Augment_HighVoltage.description: Gain an Ionic Spark. Your Ionic Sparks have +3 hex radius and do 20% more damage.

TFT_Augment_Pilfer.name: Pilfer
TFT_Augment_Pilfer.description: Each round, gain a 1-star copy of the first champion you killed last combat. The first time you gain 25 gold worth of champions in this way, gain a Thief's Gloves.

TFT_Augment_HardCommit.name: Hard Commit
TFT_Augment_HardCommit.description: Gain a random Emblem. Now and at the start of each Stage, gain a 1-star champion of that trait with a cost equal to the Stage (max 5) and 2 gold.

TFT_Augment_InvestedPlus.name: Invested+
TFT_Augment_InvestedPlus.description: Gain 26 gold. After every combat, gain 1 Shop reroll for every 10 gold above 50 (max 80 gold).

TFT_Augment_InvestedPlusPlus.name: Invested++
TFT_Augment_InvestedPlusPlus.description: Gain 40 gold. After every combat, gain 1 Shop reroll for every 10 gold above 50 (max 80 gold).

TFT_Augment_ItemCollector1.name: Item Collector I
TFT_Augment_ItemCollector1.description: For each unique item they are holding, your team gains 1% Attack Damage and 1% Ability Power.

TFT_Augment_ItemCollector2.name: Item Collector II
TFT_Augment_ItemCollector2.description: Your team gains 20 Health. For each unique item they are holding, your team gains bonus 5 Health, 1% Attack Damage, and 1% Ability Power.

TFT_Augment_Replication.name: Replication
TFT_Augment_Replication.description: Choose 1 of 3 components. For the next 2 rounds, gain a copy of that component.

TFT_Augment_PlaceboPlus.name: Placebo+
TFT_Augment_PlaceboPlus.description: Your team gains 1% Attack Speed. Gain 14 gold.

TFT_Augment_DuoQueue.name: Duo Queue
TFT_Augment_DuoQueue.description: Gain 2 random 5-cost champions and 2 copies of a random component.

TFT_Augment_FindYourCenter.name: Find Your Center
TFT_Augment_FindYourCenter.description: Your champion that starts combat in the center of the front row gains 15% Damage Amp and 15% max Health.

TFT7_Augment_PandorasBench.name: Pandora's Bench
TFT7_Augment_PandorasBench.description: At the start of every round, champions on the 3 rightmost bench slots transform into random champions of the same cost. Gain 6 gold.

TFT9_Augment_HedgeFund.name: Hedge Fund
TFT9_Augment_HedgeFund.description:
Gain 25 gold. Your max interest is increased to 10.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

TFT_Augment_Dummify.name: Dummify
TFT_Augment_Dummify.description: Lose all champions on your board and bench. Gain a Training Dummy with 80% of their combined health. The dummy gains 1200 Health per stage.

TFT_Augment_HeadStart.name: Delayed Start
TFT_Augment_HeadStart.description: Sell your board and bench. Gain 4 random 2-star 1-cost champions. Disable your Shop for the next 3 rounds.

TFT_Augment_Survivor.name: Survivor
TFT_Augment_Survivor.description: Gain 4 gold. After 3 players are eliminated, gain 100 more gold.

TFT_Augment_TacticiansKitchen.name: Tactician's Kitchen
TFT_Augment_TacticiansKitchen.description: Gain a random Emblem. After 6 rounds, gain a Tactician's Cape.

TFT_Augment_CraftedCrafting.name: Crafted Crafting
TFT_Augment_CraftedCrafting.description: Whenever you craft a completed item, gain 2 rerolls.

TFT_Augment_MirroredMonetization.name: Malicious Monetization
TFT_Augment_MirroredMonetization.description: Gain 2 gold. For the next 3 rounds, enemy champions drop 2 gold when killed.

TFT_Augment_Coronation.name: Coronation
TFT_Augment_Coronation.description: Gain a Tactician's Crown. Tactician's Crown, Shield, and Cape grant the holder an additional 20% Attack Speed, 25% Attack Damage, and 30% Ability Power.

TFT_Augment_OneBuffTwoBuff.name: One Buff, Two Buff
TFT_Augment_OneBuffTwoBuff.description: Gain a Red Buff, a Blue Buff, and a Champion Duplicator.

TFT_Augment_Moonlight.name: Moonlight
TFT_Augment_Moonlight.description: Combat start: 1 random 1-cost champion is upgraded to 3-star for that round and gains 40% Attack Damage and 40% Ability Power.

TFT_Augment_BronzeForLifeI.name: Bronze For Life I
TFT_Augment_BronzeForLifeI.description:
Your team gains 2.5% Damage Amp for each Bronze-tier trait.

Damage Amp Bonus: %

TFT_Augment_BronzeForLife2.name: Bronze For Life II
TFT_Augment_BronzeForLife2.description:
Your team gains 2.5% Damage Amp and 2% Durability for each Bronze-tier trait.

Damage Amp Bonus: %
Durability Bonus: %

TFT_Augment_TwoTrick.name: Two Trick
TFT_Augment_TwoTrick.description: Gain a random 2-star 2-cost and 2 random 2-star 1-cost champions.

TFT_Augment_Trifecta1.name: Trifecta I
TFT_Augment_Trifecta1.description:
Gain 2 3-cost champions.
Combat Start: 3 random 3-cost champions gain 220 Health and 20% Attack Speed.

TFT_Augment_Trifecta2.name: Trifecta II
TFT_Augment_Trifecta2.description:
Gain 3 3-cost champions. Allies gain 5% Attack Speed.
Combat Start: 3 random 3-cost champions gain 300 Health and 25% Attack Speed.

TFT_Augment_Dhampyr.name: Vampiric Vitality
TFT_Augment_Dhampyr.description: You heal for 12% of the damage you deal to enemy Tacticians. Your team  gains 12% Omnivamp.

TFT_Augment_Pyromaniac.name: Pyromaniac
TFT_Augment_Pyromaniac.description: Gain a Red Buff. Your Burns deal 50% increased damage.

TFT_Augment_Golemify.name: Golemify
TFT_Augment_Golemify.description: Lose all champions on your board and bench. Gain a Golem with 60% of their combined Health and 50% of their combined Attack Damage. The Golem gains 1000 Health per stage.

TFT_Augment_Lineup.name: Lineup
TFT_Augment_Lineup.description: Your team gains 2 Armor and Magic Resist for each ally that starts combat in the front two rows.

TFT_Augment_QualityOverQuantity.name: Quality Over Quantity
TFT_Augment_QualityOverQuantity.description:
Champions holding exactly 1 item upgrade that item to Radiant. Champions holding Radiant items gain 7% Health. Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

Thief's Gloves counts as multiple items.

TFT_Augment_BeltOverflow.name: Belt Overflow
TFT_Augment_BeltOverflow.description: Gain 4 Giant's Belts. Your Giant's Belts grant +75 bonus Health.

TFT_Augment_WandOverflow.name: Wand Overflow
TFT_Augment_WandOverflow.description: Gain 4 Needlessly Large Rods. Your Needlessly Large Rods grant +5% Attack Speed.

TFT_Augment_SwordOverflow.name: Sword Overflow
TFT_Augment_SwordOverflow.description: Gain 4 B.F. Swords. Your B.F. Swords grant +5% Attack Speed.

TFT_Augment_TableScraps.name: Table Scraps
TFT_Augment_TableScraps.description: After the next 2 carousels, gain one champion that was not taken and its item. Gain 1 gold.

TFT_Augment_CrownguardSpirit.name: Crown's Will
TFT_Augment_CrownguardSpirit.description: Gain a Needlessly Large Rod. Your team gains 10 Ability Power and 8 Armor.

TFT_Augment_ShojinSpirit.name: Spear's Will
TFT_Augment_ShojinSpirit.description: Your team gains 10% Attack Damage and 5 Mana. Gain a B.F. Sword.

TFT_Augment_MagicRoll.name: A Magic Roll
TFT_Augment_MagicRoll.description:
Roll 3 dice. Gain rewards based on their total.

Reward:

TFT_Augment_GuardbreakerSpirit.name: Mace's Will
TFT_Augment_GuardbreakerSpirit.description: Gain a Sparring Gloves. Your team gains 6% Attack Speed and 20% Critical Strike Chance.

TFT_Augment_TombRaider1.name: Tomb Raider I
TFT_Augment_TombRaider1.description: For the next 3 players eliminated, choose one of their completed items to keep.

TFT_Augment_TwoMuchValue.name: Two Much Value
TFT_Augment_TwoMuchValue.description: Gain 1 reroll for every 2 unique 2-cost champions fielded last combat. Gain 2 2-cost champions.

TFT_Augment_AnExaltedAdventure.name: An Exalted Adventure
TFT_Augment_AnExaltedAdventure.description:
Gain three 2-cost champions. If you 3-star two of them, gain an orb filled with loot. Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator at the start of next 2 stages.

Champions: , ,

TFT_Augment_ExpectedUnexpectedness.name: Expected Unexpectedness
TFT_Augment_ExpectedUnexpectedness.description: Now and at the start of the next 2 stages, roll 3 dice. Gain various rewards based on their total.

TFT_Augment_RiggedShopPlus.name: Rigged Shop+
TFT_Augment_RiggedShopPlus.description: Your next shop and every 4 shops will contain all 3-cost champions. Gain 5 rerolls.

TFT_Augment_PairOfFours.name: Pair of Fours
TFT_Augment_PairOfFours.description: If your team has exactly 2 4-cost champions, they each gain 504 Health and 28.4% Attack Speed. Gain a random 4-cost.

TFT_Augment_GoldForDummies.name: Gold For Dummies
TFT_Augment_GoldForDummies.description: Gain a Training Dummy. Every 10 seconds, all Training Dummies grant 1 gold.

TFT_Augment_BlazingSoul.name: Blazing Soul I
TFT_Augment_BlazingSoul.description: Combat start: Your highest Attack Speed champion gains 20% Ability Power and 20% Attack Speed. Repeat on another ally every 3 seconds.

TFT_Augment_BlazingSoul2.name: Blazing Soul II
TFT_Augment_BlazingSoul2.description: Combat start: Your highest Attack Speed champion gains 35% Ability Power and 35% Attack Speed. Repeat on another ally every 3 seconds.

TFT_Augment_Corrosion.name: Corrosion
TFT_Augment_Corrosion.description: Enemy champions in the first two rows lose 4 Armor and Magic Resist every 2 seconds.

TFT_Augment_FiresalePlus.name: Firesale
TFT_Augment_FiresalePlus.description: Each round, steal a random 3-cost or lower champion from the shop. Gain 1 gold.

TFT_Augment_TitanicTitan.name: Titanic Titan
TFT_Augment_TitanicTitan.description: Increase your current and max player Health by 25. On carousel rounds you are released earlier, but are much slower.

TFT_Augment_InvestmentStrategy1.name: Investment Strategy I
TFT_Augment_InvestmentStrategy1.description: Your champions gain 8 permanent max Health per interest you earn.

TFT_Augment_GlassCannonI.name: Glass Cannon I
TFT_Augment_GlassCannonI.description: Allies that start combat in the back row begin combat at 80% Health but gain 17% Damage Amp.

TFT_Augment_InvestmentStrategy2.name: Investment Strategy II
TFT_Augment_InvestmentStrategy2.description: Your champions gain 8 permanent max Health per interest you earn. Your max interest is increased to 7. Gain 3 gold.

TFT_Augment_GlassCannonII.name: Glass Cannon II
TFT_Augment_GlassCannonII.description: Allies that start combat in the back row begin combat at 80% Health but gain 30% Damage Amp.

TFT_Augment_Overheal.name: Overheal
TFT_Augment_Overheal.description: Every third attack deals 110% damage and heals 60% of the damage. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 400 Health.

TFT_Augment_Warpath.name: Warpath
TFT_Augment_Warpath.description:
Gain a 2-star 2-cost champion. After dealing 80 player damage, gain a chest of high cost champions and items.
(Current: )

TFT_Augment_EyeForAnEye.name: Eye For An Eye
TFT_Augment_EyeForAnEye.description:
For every 15 ally champions that die, gain a random component (max 3).

Deaths Remaining:

TFT_Augment_EyeForAnEyePlus.name: Eye For An Eye+
TFT_Augment_EyeForAnEyePlus.description:
Gain a random component. For every 18 ally champions that die, gain another component (max 2).

Deaths Remaining:

TFT_Augment_ClimbTheLadder1.name: Climb The Ladder I
TFT_Augment_ClimbTheLadder1.description: Each time an ally dies, allies that share at least one trait with them gain 3% Ability Power, 3% Attack Damage, 3 Armor, and 3 Magic Resist.

TFT_Augment_NobleSacrifice.name: Noble Sacrifice
TFT_Augment_NobleSacrifice.description: When your first ally dies each combat, grant your team 25 + 10% of that ally's Armor and Magic Resistance.

TFT_Augment_CloningFacility.name: Cloning Facility
TFT_Augment_CloningFacility.description: Empower the hex in the center of the third row. Summon a clone of the champion in it with 80% base Health and 10% increased Mana cost.

TFT_Augment_ClimbTheLadder2.name: Climb The Ladder II
TFT_Augment_ClimbTheLadder2.description: Each time an ally dies, allies that share at least one trait with them gain 5% Ability Power, 5% Attack Damage, 5 Armor, and 5 Magic Resist.

TFT_Augment_TombRaider2.name: Tomb Raider II
TFT_Augment_TombRaider2.description: Gain 1 completed item anvil. Every time a player is eliminated, choose one of their completed items to keep.

TFT_Augment_SpiritLink1.name: Spirit Link
TFT_Augment_SpiritLink1.description: Champions restore 5% of their max Health every 4 seconds. Increase the healing by 0.5% for every 10 missing player Health.

TFT6_Augment_SalvageBin.name: Salvage Bin
TFT6_Augment_SalvageBin.description: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 8 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's items and Emblems).

TFT8_Augment_SalvageBinPlus.name: Salvage Bin+
TFT8_Augment_SalvageBinPlus.description: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 4 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's items and Emblems).

TFT6_Augment_SalvageBinHR.name: Salvage Bin
TFT6_Augment_SalvageBinHR.description: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 3 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's items and Emblems).

TFT7_Augment_BirthdayPresents.name: Birthday Present
TFT7_Augment_BirthdayPresents.description: Gain a 2-star champion and 1 gold every time you level up. The champion's cost tier is your level minus 4 (max: 5-cost).

TFT_Augment_BranchingOutPlus.name: Branching Out+
TFT_Augment_BranchingOutPlus.description:
Gain a random Emblem and a Reforger.

Reforgers allow you to remake any item.

TFT_Augment_HeroicGrabBagPlus.name: Heroic Grab Bag+
TFT_Augment_HeroicGrabBagPlus.description:
Gain 2 Lesser Champion Duplicators and 8 gold.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

TFT_Augment_HeroicGrabBagPlusPlus.name: Heroic Grab Bag++
TFT_Augment_HeroicGrabBagPlusPlus.description:
Gain 2 Lesser Champion Duplicators and 14 gold.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

TFT_Augment_CookingPot.name: Cooking Pot
TFT_Augment_CookingPot.description: At the start of each turn, all allies holding a Frying Pan or Spatula item grant the nearest champion 40 permanent Health. Gain a Frying Pan.

TFT6_Augment_Diversify1.name: Stand United
TFT6_Augment_Diversify1.description:
Gain 1.5% Attack Damage and 1.5% Ability Power for each non-unique Trait active across your team.

Current Bonus: % %i:scaleAD% % %i:scaleAP%

TFT7_Augment_Preparation2.name: Preparation II
TFT7_Augment_Preparation2.description: Champions on your bench permanently gain 50 Health, 3% Attack Damage, and 3% Ability Power every round. Champions start with 1 stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

TFT7_Augment_Preparation.name: Preparation I
TFT7_Augment_Preparation.description: Champions on your bench permanently gain 30 Health, 2% Attack Damage, and 2% Ability Power every round. Champions start with 1 stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

TFT7_Augment_AFK.name: AFK
TFT7_Augment_AFK.description: You cannot perform actions for the next 3 rounds. Afterwards, gain 20 gold.

TFT7_Augment_BigFriend.name: Big Friend I
TFT7_Augment_BigFriend.description: Allies that start combat next to an ally with over 1750 Health gain 9% Durability.

TFT7_Augment_BigFriend2.name: Big Friend II
TFT7_Augment_BigFriend2.description: Allies that start combat next to an ally with over 1750 Health gain 13% Durability.

TFT6_Augment_CyberneticUplink3.name: Cybernetic Uplink III
TFT6_Augment_CyberneticUplink3.description: Your champions holding an item gain 275 Health and restore 3 Mana per second.

TFT6_Augment_CyberneticUplink2.name: Cybernetic Uplink II
TFT6_Augment_CyberneticUplink2.description: Your champions holding an item gain 120 Health and restore 2 Mana per second.

TFT6_Augment_HyperRoll.name: Hustler
TFT6_Augment_HyperRoll.description:
You earn no interest, but gain 2 gold and 2 XP at the start of every player combat round. Gain 3 gold now.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

TFT6_Augment_CalculatedLoss.name: Calculated Loss
TFT6_Augment_CalculatedLoss.description: After losing your combat, gain 2 gold and a free Shop reroll.

TFT9_Augment_Commander_Ascension.name: Ascension
TFT9_Augment_Commander_Ascension.description: After 15 seconds of combat, gain 60% Damage Amp.

TFT9_Augment_Commander_FinalAscension.name: Final Ascension
TFT9_Augment_Commander_FinalAscension.description: Your team gains 20% Damage Amp. After 15 seconds, this increases to 60% Damage Amp.

TFT9_Augment_HealingOrbsI.name: Healing Orbs I
TFT9_Augment_HealingOrbsI.description: When an enemy dies, the nearest ally is healed for 220.

TFT9_Augment_HealingOrbsII.name: Healing Orbs II
TFT9_Augment_HealingOrbsII.description: When an enemy dies, the nearest ally is healed for 440.

TFT_Augment_PlotArmor.name: Plot Armor
TFT_Augment_PlotArmor.description: Your team gains 8 Armor and Magic Resist. After falling below 50% Health, increase this to 40 for the rest of combat.

TFT_Augment_TimeSkip.name: Time Skip
TFT_Augment_TimeSkip.description: Disable your Shop for the next 3 rounds. Then gain 32 XP.

TFT_Augment_SilverDestiny.name: Silver Destiny
TFT_Augment_SilverDestiny.description: Gain a random Silver Augment and 2 gold.

TFT_Augment_SilverDestinyPlus.name: Silver Destiny+
TFT_Augment_SilverDestinyPlus.description: Gain a random Silver Augment and 4 gold.

TFT_Augment_SilverDestinyPlusPlus.name: Silver Destiny++
TFT_Augment_SilverDestinyPlusPlus.description: Gain a random Silver Augment and 7 gold.

TFT_Augment_GoldDestiny.name: Gold Destiny
TFT_Augment_GoldDestiny.description: Gain a random Gold Augment and 3 gold.

TFT_Augment_GoldDestinyPlus.name: Gold Destiny+
TFT_Augment_GoldDestinyPlus.description: Gain a random Gold Augment and 6 gold.

TFT_Augment_PrismaticDestiny.name: Prismatic Destiny
TFT_Augment_PrismaticDestiny.description: Gain a random Prismatic Augment and 4 gold.

TFT_Augment_Protagonist.name: Protagonist
TFT_Augment_Protagonist.description: Gain a random 1-cost Champion Augment. After 3 turns, gain a copy of the champion at the start of every turn.

TFT_Augment_StoryOfSeven.name: A Story of Seven
TFT_Augment_StoryOfSeven.description:
Collect Golden Balls by defeating players in combat. Collect all 7 for a reward, then restart the quest with more powerful rewards.

Gain a 2-star 1-cost champion to start your journey.

TFT_Augment_EfficientShopper.name: Efficient Shopper
TFT_Augment_EfficientShopper.description: For the next 4 carousels, gain a second copy of the champion taken.

TFT_Augment_TeslaCoil.name: Tesla Coil
TFT_Augment_TeslaCoil.description: Each of your allies with 3 items equipped emits 2 arcs of lightning every 5 seconds, dealing 240-270 magic damage based on stage.

TFT_Augment_HardBargain.name: Hard Bargain
TFT_Augment_HardBargain.description:
You cannot choose your Carousel rewards. Gain an additional 6 player Health and 10 Gold each carousel round.
When you do not pick a Carousel Reward, you are given an unpicked champion and the item it carries

TFT_Augment_HowlingGale.name: Howling Gale
TFT_Augment_HowlingGale.description: For every 550 Mana your team spends, summon a whirlwind that knocks up enemies.

TFT_Augment_EvilBeyondMeasure.name: Evil Beyond Measure
TFT_Augment_EvilBeyondMeasure.description: Your champions deal 4.5% of their damage as True Damage for each Star level.

TFT_Augment_HeftyRolls.name: Hefty Rolls
TFT_Augment_HeftyRolls.description:
Your team gains 8 Health and size for each time you've rolled this game.

Rolls: Health:

TFT_Augment_BloodRage.name: Blood Rage
TFT_Augment_BloodRage.description: Your allies gain 12-25% Damage Amp based on their missing Health. Maximum Damage Amp gained at 30% Health.

TFT_Augment_NineLives.name: Nine Lives
TFT_Augment_NineLives.description: Set your current and max player Health to 9. On combat loss, you only lose 1 health and gain loot. You can't gain health.

TFT_Augment_ChaosEvolution.name: Chaotic Evolution
TFT_Augment_ChaosEvolution.description: Starring up a champion grants them one of the following: 100 Health, 6% Durability, 10% Ability Power, 10% Attack Damage, 10% Attack Speed. Bonuses stack.

TFT_Augment_TreasureHunt.name: Treasure Hunt
TFT_Augment_TreasureHunt.description: Gain a locked chest each Stage between now and Stage 6. Unlock each chest when you spend 20 gold on Shop rerolls. These chests persist until opened.

TFT_Augment_FoodfightTactics.name: Mess Hall
TFT_Augment_FoodfightTactics.description: After 10 seconds of combat, your champions gain 8% Attack Speed and attacks also hurl 2 delicious projectiles that deal 30 (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) magic damage.

TFT_Augment_BackupDancers.name: Backup Dancers
TFT_Augment_BackupDancers.description: Combat start:  Every 3 seconds, champions in your 3 rightmost bench slots grant your team 3% Attack Speed per slot.

TFT_Augment_HeavyIsTheCrown.name: Heavy Is the Crown
TFT_Augment_HeavyIsTheCrown.description: Gain a Crown of Demacia, which provides significant bonuses to the wearer. If the holder dies, lose the round.

TFT_Augment_Crossfire2.name: Piercing Sight
TFT_Augment_Crossfire2.description: Enemies take 1% damage as bonus true damage, increased by 1% up to 20% every time they take damage.

TFT_Augment_Incoming.name: Lit Fuse
TFT_Augment_Incoming.description: Allies that start in the back two rows split 60 total Mana after 6 seconds of combat.

TFT_Augment_HoldTheLine.name: Hold the Line
TFT_Augment_HoldTheLine.description: Allies in your back 2 rows gain 10% Ability Power and 9% Attack Damage for each ally that starts combat in your front row.

TFT_Augment_UnlimitedPower.name: Unlimited Power
TFT_Augment_UnlimitedPower.description:
Gain a Nashor's Tooth, a Jeweled Gauntlet, a Needlessly Large Rod and a Magnetic Remover.

Useful for Magic Carries!

TFT_Augment_WaterLotus1.name: Water Lotus I
TFT_Augment_WaterLotus1.description: Your team gains 5% Critical Strike chance, and their Abilities can critically strike. If an Ability critically strikes, restore 9% of your Mana over 3 seconds.

TFT_Augment_WaterLotus2.name: Water Lotus II
TFT_Augment_WaterLotus2.description: Your team gains 20% Critical Strike chance, and their Abilities can critically strike. If an Ability critically strikes, restore 15% of your Mana over 3 seconds.

TFT_Augment_DeadlierCaps.name: Deadlier Caps
TFT_Augment_DeadlierCaps.description: Gain a Rabadon's Deathcap. Rabadon's Deathcaps permanently gain 1% Ability Power whenever their holders score a takedown.

TFT_Augment_TragicalBlade.name: Deadlier Blades
TFT_Augment_TragicalBlade.description: Gain a Deathblade. Deathblades permanently gain 1% Attack Damage whenever their holders score a takedown.

TFT_Augment_AnotherOne.name: Another One!
TFT_Augment_AnotherOne.description: The next completed item you make grants an additional copy of it. Gain 5 gold now.

TFT_Augment_AnotherOnePlus.name: Another One!+
TFT_Augment_AnotherOnePlus.description: The next completed item you make grants another copy of it. Gain 1 component anvil.

TFT_Augment_PsychicForge.name: Psychic Forge
TFT_Augment_PsychicForge.description: Round start Completed Items on benched champions turn into one of their recommended items. Gain a random completed item.

TFT_Augment_ExclusiveCustomization.name: Exclusive Customization
TFT_Augment_ExclusiveCustomization.description:
Gain a Lucky Item Chest and a Magnetic Remover and 10 gold.

Use a Lucky Item Chest on a champion to choose from an armory of recommended items!

TFT_Augment_CryMeARiver.name: Cry Me A River
TFT_Augment_CryMeARiver.description: Gain a Tear of the Goddess. Your team gains 1 Mana Regen. After 10 seconds in combat, increase this to 2.

TFT_Augment_PocketRecombobulator.name: Pocket Recombobulator
TFT_Augment_PocketRecombobulator.description: Get 2 Pocket Recombobulators, a consumable that transforms a 1 or 2-cost champion into one of a higher cost. They keep their Star level. Also receive 2 Reforgers.

TFT_Augment_HomeCooking.name: Care Package
TFT_Augment_HomeCooking.description: Now and at the start of the next 2 Stages, receive a care package with loot and 3 gold.

TFT_Augment_LastSecondSave.name: Last Second Save
TFT_Augment_LastSecondSave.description: The first time each ally falls below 35% Health, they restore 20% maximum Health.

TFT_Augment_PowerUp.name: Augmented Power
TFT_Augment_PowerUp.description: Your next augment is one tier higher.

TFT11_Augment_AtWhatCost.name: At What Cost
TFT11_Augment_AtWhatCost.description: Immediately go to level 6 and gain 12 XP. You don't get to choose your future augments.

TFT_Augment_RerollTransfer.name: Reroll Transfer
TFT_Augment_RerollTransfer.description:
For every 1 unused Augment Reroll, gain 3 free shop rerolls. Gain 1 gold.

Does not include the round this augment is selected.

TFT9_Augment_KnowYourEnemy.name: Know Your Enemy
TFT9_Augment_KnowYourEnemy.description: You can see who you will fight next. Your team gains 10% Damage Amp, increased to 18% if you and your opponent have any of the same traits active.

TFT9_Augment_TonsOfStats.name: Tons of Stats!
TFT9_Augment_TonsOfStats.description: Your team gains 44 Health, 4% Attack Damage, 4% Ability Power, 4 Armor, 4 Magic Resist, 4% Attack Speed, and 4 Mana.

TFT6_Augment_SecondWind1.name: Second Wind
TFT6_Augment_SecondWind1.description: After 10 seconds of combat, your team heals 40% of their missing Health.

TFT7_Augment_BestFriends1.name: Best Friends I
TFT7_Augment_BestFriends1.description: Allies isolated in pairs gain 10% Attack Speed and 10 Armor at the start of combat.

TFT7_Augment_BestFriends2.name: Best Friends II
TFT7_Augment_BestFriends2.description: Allies isolated in pairs gain 15% Attack Speed and 18 Armor at the start of combat.

TFT6_Augment_SunfireBoard.name: Sunfire Board
TFT6_Augment_SunfireBoard.description: Combat Start: Burn all enemies for 15% of their max Health over 15 seconds and reduce healing received by 33%.

TFT6_Augment_Keepers1.name: Keepers I
TFT6_Augment_Keepers1.description: Combat start: Grant units with adjacent allies a 130 Health Shield for 8 seconds. This Shield stacks.

TFT6_Augment_Keepers2.name: Keepers II
TFT6_Augment_Keepers2.description: Combat start: Grant units with adjacent allies a 210 Health Shield for 8 seconds. This Shield stacks.

TFT9_Augment_StarsAreBorn.name: Stars Are Born
TFT9_Augment_StarsAreBorn.description: The first 1-cost and 2-cost champions you buy are instantly upgraded to 2-star. Gain 7 gold.

TFT_Augment_Underdogs.name: Underdogs
TFT_Augment_Underdogs.description: Whenever your team has fewer allies alive than your opponent, regenerate 4% missing Health each second (Max: 150).

TFT_Augment_ExplosiveGrowth.name: Explosive Growth
TFT_Augment_ExplosiveGrowth.description: Now and at the start of the next 3 rounds, gain 7 XP.

TFT_Augment_ExplosiveGrowthPlus.name: Explosive Growth+
TFT_Augment_ExplosiveGrowthPlus.description: Now and at the start of the next 3 rounds, gain 10 XP.

TFT9_Augment_StarterKit.name: Starter Kit
TFT9_Augment_StarterKit.description:
Gain a 4-cost champion, a 2-star 1-cost champion that shares a trait with them, and 8 gold.

At the start of the next 2 stages, gain that 4-cost champion again.

TFT6_Augment_Twins2.name: Double Trouble
TFT6_Augment_Twins2.description: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 30% Attack Damage and 30% Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

TFT6_Augment_TheGoldenEgg.name: The Golden Egg
TFT6_Augment_TheGoldenEgg.description: Gain a golden egg that hatches in 11 turns for a huge amount of loot. Winning player combat speeds up the hatch timer by an extra turn.

TFT10_Augment_FullyAdapted.name: Fully Adapted
TFT10_Augment_FullyAdapted.description: Gain an Adaptive Helm. Champions holding this item gain both effects.

TFT_Augment_QuietQuitting.name: Quiet Quitting
TFT_Augment_QuietQuitting.description: For the next 3 player combats, you cannot use your shop. After, gain 24 gold and a Completed Item Anvil.

TFT_Augment_AuraFarming.name: Aura Farming
TFT_Augment_AuraFarming.description: Gain a 2-star 5-cost champion. You cannot field it until 4-3.

TFT_Augment_GoldenQuest.name: A Golden Quest
TFT_Augment_GoldenQuest.description: The first time you have 165 or more gold, gain a 2-star 5-cost champion and 2 items tailored to them.

TFT_Augment_SliceOfLife.name: Slice of Life
TFT_Augment_SliceOfLife.description: Twice per stage, gain a random champion. Its cost increases by Stage. This effect ends after receiving 2 5-cost champions.

TFT_Augment_ForwardThinking.name: Forward Thinking
TFT_Augment_ForwardThinking.description:
Lose all your gold. After 5 player combats, gain back the original amount and another 70 gold.

Incoming Gold:

TFT_Augment_GiantAndMighty.name: Giant and Mighty
TFT_Augment_GiantAndMighty.description: Your team becomes large, gaining 200 Health and 10% max Health.

TFT11_Augment_TinyButDeadly.name: Tiny, but Deadly
TFT11_Augment_TinyButDeadly.description: Your team becomes small, gaining 30% Attack Speed and Movement Speed.

TFT_Augment_LegionOfThrees.name: Legion of Threes
TFT_Augment_LegionOfThrees.description:
Gain a random Emblem. Your 3-cost champions and all allies equipped with an Emblem gain 200 Health and 12% Attack Speed.

Reckoning Championship, 2021

TFT_Augment_ForgedInStrength.name: Forged in Strength
TFT_Augment_ForgedInStrength.description:
Gain 1 random Artifact. When you drop below 35 Health, gain 3 more random Artifacts.

Remix Rumble Championship, 2023

TFT_Augment_EarlyLearning.name: Early Learnings
TFT_Augment_EarlyLearning.description:
Your team gains 8% Attack Damage & Ability Power. This increases by 1% after each player combat. 1-cost champions gain double.

TFT Vegas Open, 2023

TFT_Augment_LateGameScaling.name: Late Game Scaling
TFT_Augment_LateGameScaling.description:
Gain 2 XP every round. Your 5-cost champions gain 12% Health and 12% Attack Speed.

CyberCity Tactician's Crown, 2025

TFT_Augment_SweetTreats.name: Sweet Treats
TFT_Augment_SweetTreats.description:
Gain an Artifact anvil. Your team gains 25 Health for each item equipped on champions.

Health Gained:

Magic N' Mayhem Tactician's Crown, 2024

TFT_Augment_SpeedyDoubleKill.name: Speedy Double Kill
TFT_Augment_SpeedyDoubleKill.description:
Gain a Guinsoo's Rageblade. When 2 players are eliminated, gain 40 gold.

Fates Championship, 2021

TFT_Augment_TheGoldenDragon.name: The Golden Dragon
TFT_Augment_TheGoldenDragon.description:
Gain a Mogul's Mail. Champions holding Mogul's Mail take up 2 team slots but gain 500 Health and 20% Durability.

Mogul's Mail gives gold as well as combat power.
Dragonlands Championship, 2022

TFT_Augment_BirthdayReunion.name: Birthday Reunion
TFT_Augment_BirthdayReunion.description:
Gain a random 2-star 2-cost champion. When you reach Level 6, gain a Thief's Gloves. When you reach Level 9, gain a random 2-star 5-cost champion.

Inkborn Fables Tactician's Crown, 2024

TFT_Augment_MaxBuild.name: Max Build
TFT_Augment_MaxBuild.description:
Gain a Champion Duplicator and 7 free Shop rerolls. On Stage 6-1, gain these again.

Galaxies Championship, 2020

TFT_Augment_BodyguardTraining.name: Bodyguard Training
TFT_Augment_BodyguardTraining.description:
Allies gain 10 Armor and Magic Resist, increased by 3 per player level.

Gizmos & Gadgets Championship, 2022

TFT_Augment_EpicRolldown.name: Epic Rolldown
TFT_Augment_EpicRolldown.description:
When you reach Level 8, gain 23 Shop rerolls.

Runeterra Reforged Championship, 2023

TFT_Augment_ArcaneViktory.name: Arcane Viktor-y
TFT_Augment_ArcaneViktory.description:
After 8 seconds of combat, stun the enemy team for 1.5 seconds. Repeat this after 20 seconds of combat.

TFT Macao Open, 2024

TFT_Augment_InfinityProtection.name: Infinity Protection
TFT_Augment_InfinityProtection.description:
Gain 8 Gold now. On 3-7, gain an Infinity Force. Infinity Force gives allies in the same row a 15% Health shield.

Monsters Attack Championship, 2023

TFT_Augment_WeStickTogether.name: We Stick Together
TFT_Augment_WeStickTogether.description:
Gain a random Emblem and a completed item anvil. Allies that share a trait with that Emblem gain 20% Attack Speed. (Emblem Trait: )

Into The Arcane Tactician's Crown, 2025

TFT16_Augment_IllaoiCarry.name: Leap of Faith
TFT16_Augment_IllaoiCarry.description: Gain an Illaoi. Your strongest Illaoi becomes a Fighter. Her Ability is replaced with an airborne slam that's recast when she kills her target.

TFT16_Augment_XinZhaoCarry.name: Trials of Twilight
TFT16_Augment_XinZhaoCarry.description: Gain a Xin Zhao. Your strongest Xin Zhao constantly strikes nearby enemies and executes enemies. After 5 player combats as a 3-star, unlock Zaahen. He replaces Xin Zhao and takes his items.

TFT16_Augment_FireAxiom.name: Fire Axiom
TFT16_Augment_FireAxiom.description: Gain a Fire Hex. Champions within gain 15% Attack Damage and Ability Power. Their damage 1% Burns and 33% Wounds for 6 seconds.

TFT16_Augment_EarthAxiom.name: Earth Axiom
TFT16_Augment_EarthAxiom.description: Gain an Earth Hex. Champions within gain 30 Armor and Magic Resist. At 50% Health, they Stun enemies within 2 hexes for 1.5 seconds.

TFT16_Augment_AirAxiom.name: Air Axiom
TFT16_Augment_AirAxiom.description: Gain an Air Hex. Champions within gain 25% Attack Speed and their damage 30% Sunders enemies for 5 seconds.

TFT16_Augment_WaterAxiom.name: Water Axiom
TFT16_Augment_WaterAxiom.description: Gain a Water Hex. Champions within gain 3 Mana Regen. Their damage 30% Shreds enemies for 5 seconds.

TFT16_Augment_TheAxiomata.name: The Axiomata
TFT16_Augment_TheAxiomata.description: Gain 3 random elemental hex augments. Future augment rounds instead grant you 1 random elemental hex and gold based on the augment's tier.

TFT16_Augment_RumbleCarry.name: Artillery Barrage
TFT16_Augment_RumbleCarry.description: Gain a Rumble. Your strongest Rumble gains +7 Range and constantly fires missiles at enemies, increased with Attack Speed.

TFT16_Augment_TheDarkinForge.name: Unsealed From Steel
TFT16_Augment_TheDarkinForge.description: Choose 1 of 4 Darkin Weapons. Darkin Weapons are Artifacts that grant the Darkin trait.

TFT16_Augment_TheWorldRunes.name: The World Runes
TFT16_Augment_TheWorldRunes.description: Gain 2 Emblems from random Region traits. After 4 player combats with 4 Region traits active, gain a powerful reward. (<placeholder>/4)

TFT16_TeamupAugment_JarvanShyvana.name: Dragonguards
TFT16_TeamupAugment_JarvanShyvana.description: Gain a Shyvana and a 2-star Jarvan IV. When Jarvan casts, Shyvana gains Shield. When Shyvana casts, Jarvan jumps in and deals damage based on his Armor and Magic Resist. After every player combat, gain a Jarvan IV.

TFT16_Augment_NoxianInvasion.name: Darkwill's Invasion
TFT16_Augment_NoxianInvasion.description: Your team gains 10% Damage Amp, increased to 15% if the Noxus trait is active.

TFT16_Augment_DefenseOfIonia.name: Defense of the Placidium
TFT16_Augment_DefenseOfIonia.description: Your team gains 8% Durability, increased to 12% if the Ionia trait is active.

TFT16_Augment_UltraRapidFire.name: U.R.F
TFT16_Augment_UltraRapidFire.description: Gain a Spatula. Champions holding Spatula or Frying Pan items gain 15% Attack Speed and 2 Mana Regen.

TFT16_Augment_WoodAxiom.name: Wood Axiom
TFT16_Augment_WoodAxiom.description: Gain a Wood Hex. Champions within gain 15% max Health. After combat, they permanently gain 40 Health.

TFT16_TeamupAugment_LucianVayne.name: Sentinels of Light
TFT16_TeamupAugment_LucianVayne.description: Gain a Lucian & Senna and a 2-star Vayne. Vayne fires additional bolts at enemies afflicted with Black Mist and on takedown, grants Attack Speed to Lucian & Senna.

TFT16_TeamupAugment_SingedTeemo.name: Poison Pals
TFT16_TeamupAugment_SingedTeemo.description: Gain a Singed and a 2-star Teemo. Every 4 seconds, Teemo fires a Toxic Dart at Singed's target. When an enemy poisoned by Teemo dies, Singed gains Ability Power for the rest of combat.

TFT16_TeamupAugment_AmbessaKindred.name: Chosen Wolves
TFT16_TeamupAugment_AmbessaKindred.description: Gain an Ambessa and a Kindred. When Kindred casts, Ambessa always gains their protection against death and gains Attack Damage while protected. When Ambessa casts, Wolf strikes all enemies hit, dealing reduced damage.

TFT16_Augment_BandleBounty.name: Bandle Bounty I
TFT16_Augment_BandleBounty.description: For every Yordle you've unlocked or unlock, gain 3 gold. The Bandle Paths reveal a secret Yordle 10. Gain a Rumble and Lulu.

TFT16_Augment_BandleBountyPlus.name: Bandle Bounty II
TFT16_Augment_BandleBountyPlus.description: For every Yordle you've unlocked or unlock, gain 5 gold. The Bandle Paths reveal a secret Yordle 10! Gain a Tristana and Teemo.

TFT16_Augment_WalkTheTruePath.name: Walk The True Path I
TFT16_Augment_WalkTheTruePath.description: Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator, a Shen, a Jhin, and 6 gold. Ionia 10 gains a Prismatic upgrade.

TFT16_Augment_WalkTheTruePathPlus.name: Walk The True Path II
TFT16_Augment_WalkTheTruePathPlus.description: Gain 2 Lesser Champion Duplicators, a Jhin, a Shen, and an Infinity Edge. Ionia 10 gains a Prismatic upgrade.

TFT16_Augment_DemaciaForever.name: Demacia Forever
TFT16_Augment_DemaciaForever.description: Demacians gain 7 permanent Health every time they rally. They also gain 1.5% permanent Attack Damage and Ability Power every 3 rallies. Gain a Jarvan IV, a Sona, and a Xin Zhao.

TFT16_Augment_Yordle_WildGrowth.name: Wild Growth
TFT16_Augment_Yordle_WildGrowth.description: 3-star Yordles become massive, moving slower but gaining 15% Health and 25% Attack Damage and Ability Power. Gain a Rumble and Lulu.

TFT16_Augment_Void_EvolveAndOvercome.name: Evolve and Overcome
TFT16_Augment_Void_EvolveAndOvercome.description:
For every 5 enemies that Mutated Void allies takedown, gain 2 XP. Gain a Cho'Gath and a 2-star Kog'Maw. (Takedowns: /5)

Void provides unique Mutations.

TFT16_Augment_Weightlifting.name: Lifting Competition
TFT16_Augment_Weightlifting.description:
At the start of each round, if the combined Health of all your unique Bruisers is high enough, gain a reward and increase the threshold (up to four times). Gain an Shen and a Sion.

/

TFT16_Augment_ShadowIsles_RuinedKing.name: The Ruined King
TFT16_Augment_ShadowIsles_RuinedKing.description: Gain a 2-star Viego. Your strongest Viego shares 30% of his Passive with other Shadow Isles allies. After collecting 100 souls, his Ability upgrades.

TFT16_Augment_Shurima_SecretsOfTheSands.name: Secrets of the Sands
TFT16_Augment_Shurima_SecretsOfTheSands.description: Gain 6 gold. Gain an Azir on Stage 3-5. Each time you unlock a Shuriman, gain an ideal item for them.

TFT16_Augment_Arcanist_ChaosMagic.name: Chaos Magic
TFT16_Augment_Arcanist_ChaosMagic.description: Arcanists gain 1 Mana Regen. After every 150 Mana they spend, a magical effect hits the board. Gain a Lulu and a Kog'Maw.

TFT16_Augment_Zaun_SilcosRevenge.name: Silco's Revenge
TFT16_Augment_Zaun_SilcosRevenge.description: Zaunites explode into Shimmer on death, dealing 45% of their max Health to 2 nearby enemies as magic damage. Gain a Blitzcrank, an Ekko, and a Vi.

TFT16_Augment_Piltover_HexgateTravel.name: Hexgate Travel
TFT16_Augment_Piltover_HexgateTravel.description: When the Piltover invention triggers for the first time each combat, gain a random number of Piltover champions that cost between 1 and 3 gold. Gain a Caitlyn and a Vi.

TFT16_Augment_Noxus_BringerOfRuin.name: Bringer of Ruin
TFT16_Augment_Noxus_BringerOfRuin.description:
Every takedown Atakhan scores permanently grants him 2% Ability Power and 30 max Health. Gain a Briar and a Sion.
(Current Takedowns: )

TFT16_Augment_Ixtal_Expeditionist.name: Ixtal Expeditionist
TFT16_Augment_Ixtal_Expeditionist.description: Gain a Qiyana, a Neeko, and a Milio. Increase your current and max player Health by 10.

TFT6_Augment_TradeSector2.name: Commerce Core
TFT6_Augment_TradeSector2.description: Gain 10 free Shop rerolls now and 4 every round for the rest of the game.

TFT_Augment_AdvancedLoan.name: Advanced Loan
TFT_Augment_AdvancedLoan.description: Gain 20 Gold. Your next augment is one tier lower.

TFT_Augment_AdvancedLoanPlus.name: Advanced Loan+
TFT_Augment_AdvancedLoanPlus.description: Gain 33 Gold. Your next augment is one tier lower.

TFT_Augment_TheDarkinBlade.name: Blood Offering
TFT_Augment_TheDarkinBlade.description: Gain a Bloodthirster. Combat start: Allies holding Bloodthirsters lose 20% Health but gain a 30% Health shield and 10% Attack Damage.

TFT_Augment_Indecision1.name: Indecision I
TFT_Augment_Indecision1.description: In 3 rounds, choose a new augment of the same tier. Gain 8 gold now.

TFT_Augment_Indecision2.name: Indecision II
TFT_Augment_Indecision2.description: In 3 rounds, choose a new augment of the same tier. Gain 12 gold now.

TFT_Augment_ConstructACompanion.name: Construct a Companion
TFT_Augment_ConstructACompanion.description: The next 1-cost champion you buy is 3 star. Gain 2 gold.

TFT_Augment_BoxingLessons.name: Boxing Lessons
TFT_Augment_BoxingLessons.description: Your team gains 30 Health for each ally that starts combat in the front row.

TFT_Augment_FeedTheFlames.name: Feed the Flames
TFT_Augment_FeedTheFlames.description: Gain a Sunfire Cape. Your team gains 12% Omnivamp when attacking Burning enemies.

TFT_Augment_MarksMan.name: Focused Fire
TFT_Augment_MarksMan.description: Your team gains 5% Attack Damage. Every 5 seconds, they gain 5% more.

TFT_Augment_Waverider.name: On a Roll
TFT_Augment_Waverider.description: Whenever you star up a champion that you fielded last combat, gain 2 free Shop rerolls. Gain 2 gold.

TFT_Augment_ComponentQuestBelt.name: Extra Buckles
TFT_Augment_ComponentQuestBelt.description:
Gain a Giant's Belt. After your team takes 75000 damage, gain 2 more.

Damage taken:

TFT_Augment_FuriousBlows.name: Kahunahuna
TFT_Augment_FuriousBlows.description: Every 5th attack deals bonus true damage equal to 200% Basic Attack Damage.

TFT_Augment_ComponentQuestBow.name: Backup Bows
TFT_Augment_ComponentQuestBow.description:
Gain a Recurve Bow. After your team attacks 1000 times, gain 2 more.

Attacks:

TFT_Augment_ComponentQuestSword.name: Carve a Path
TFT_Augment_ComponentQuestSword.description:
Gain a B.F. Sword. After your team deals 65000 physical damage, gain 2 more.

Damage dealt:

TFT_Augment_ItemGargoyleStoneplate.name: Solo Plate
TFT_Augment_ItemGargoyleStoneplate.description: Gain a Gargoyle Stoneplate. Combat start: Allies holding Gargoyle Stoneplate gain 10% max Health if they're the only one in their row.

TFT_Augment_ComponentQuestRod.name: Continuous Conjuration
TFT_Augment_ComponentQuestRod.description:
Gain a Needlessly Large Rod. After your team deals 38000 magic damage, gain 2 more.

Damage dealt:

TFT_Augment_ComponentQuestTear.name: Flowing Tears
TFT_Augment_ComponentQuestTear.description:
Gain a Tear of the Goddess. After your team spends 6500 Mana, gain 2 more.

Mana spent:

TFT_Augment_ItemSpiritVisage.name: Spirit of Redemption
TFT_Augment_ItemSpiritVisage.description: Gain a Spirit Visage. Every 5 seconds, Spirit Visage heals allies within 1 hex for 10% of their missing Health.

TFT_Augment_ComponentQuestGlove.name: Critical Success
TFT_Augment_ComponentQuestGlove.description:
Gain a Sparring Glove. After your team's attacks critically strike 320 times, gain 2 more.

Critical strikes:

TFT_Augment_SavingsAccount.name: Savings Account
TFT_Augment_SavingsAccount.description:
After you earn 50 gold in interest, gain 30 gold. Your max interest is increased to 7. Gain 4 gold now.

Gold earned:

TFT_Augment_MagicRollMinus.name: Slightly Magic Roll
TFT_Augment_MagicRollMinus.description:
Roll a die. Gain rewards based on the number rolled.

Reward:

TFT_Augment_PromisedProtection.name: Promised Protection
TFT_Augment_PromisedProtection.description: Gain a Protector's Vow. Protector's Vow grants its holder 15% additional Mana from all sources.

TFT9_Augment_JeweledLotus.name: Jeweled Lotus I
TFT9_Augment_JeweledLotus.description: Your team gains 20% Critical Strike Chance, and their Abilities can critically strike.

TFT9_Augment_GreaterJeweledLotus.name: Jeweled Lotus II
TFT9_Augment_GreaterJeweledLotus.description: Your team gains 35% Critical Strike Chance and 10% Critical Strike Damage, and their Abilities can critically strike.

TFT_Augment_NoScoutNoPivot.name: NO SCOUT NO PIVOT
TFT_Augment_NoScoutNoPivot.description: Champions that fight in player combat cannot be benched or sold. Your team gains 1% Health, and 1.5% Attack Damage and Ability Power after player combat.

TFT_Augment_WarmogsBuckle.name: Heart of Steel
TFT_Augment_WarmogsBuckle.description: Gain a Steadfast Heart. Every 10 seconds of combat its holder survives, Steadfast Heart gains additional 12 permanent max Health.

TFT_Augment_TheVidalion.name: Woven Magic
TFT_Augment_TheVidalion.description:
Gain a random item component. Every 2200 Mana your team spends grants an additional component (max /3).

Mana spent: /2200

TFT6_Augment_Distancing.name: Exiles I
TFT6_Augment_Distancing.description: Your champions that start combat with no adjacent champions gain a 20% max Health shield for 10 seconds.

TFT6_Augment_Distancing2.name: Exiles II
TFT6_Augment_Distancing2.description: Your champions that start combat with no adjacent champions gain a 35% max Health shield for 10 seconds.

TFT_Augment_Unforgotten.name: Warlord's Honor
TFT_Augment_Unforgotten.description: Every round, your team gain 5% Attack Damage and Ability Power, stacking up to 4 times.

TFT_Augment_WinOut.name: Win Out
TFT_Augment_WinOut.description: When you reach level 9, immediately level to 10 and gain 8 free Shop rerolls. Gain 6 XP now.

TFT6_Augment_CelestialBlessing1.name: Celestial Blessing I
TFT6_Augment_CelestialBlessing1.description: Your team gains 12% Omnivamp. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 200 Health.

TFT6_Augment_CelestialBlessing2.name: Celestial Blessing II
TFT6_Augment_CelestialBlessing2.description: Your team gains 18% Omnivamp. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 400 Health.

TFT6_Augment_CelestialBlessing3.name: Celestial Blessing III
TFT6_Augment_CelestialBlessing3.description: Your team gains 25% Omnivamp. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 1000 Health.

TFT_Augment_MuseumHeist.name: Component Heist
TFT_Augment_MuseumHeist.description: After 5 player combats, gain 1 of every item component.

TFT_Augment_JustSlayer.name: Indiscriminate Killer
TFT_Augment_JustSlayer.description: Gain a Giant Slayer. Giant Slayers gain their Damage Amp against all enemies instead of just Tanks.

TFT_Augment_JustHit.name: Just Hit
TFT_Augment_JustHit.description: Gain a Champion Duplicator, 18 Shop rerolls, and 10 gold.

TFT_Augment_Retribution.name: Retribution
TFT_Augment_Retribution.description: Gain 2 Hands of Justice. Allies equipped with Hand of Justice can critically strike with their Abilities.

TFT_Augment_AwakenedSoul.name: Soul Awakening
TFT_Augment_AwakenedSoul.description: Combat start: Your team gains 2% Attack Damage and Ability Power per second for 10 seconds. At max stacks, deal 15% bonus true damage.

TFT7_Augment_CursedCrown.name: Cursed Crown
TFT7_Augment_CursedCrown.description: Gain +2 max team size and your team gains 4% Durability, but you take double player damage when you lose a player combat.

TFT_Augment_ForgeRod.name: Staffsmith
TFT_Augment_ForgeRod.description: Gain 2 random completed items that build from Needlessly Large Rod.

TFT_Augment_ForgeSword.name: Swordsmith
TFT_Augment_ForgeSword.description: Gain 2 random completed items that build from B.F. Sword.

TFT_Augment_TwinGuardians.name: Twin Guardians
TFT_Augment_TwinGuardians.description: If you have exactly 2 allies in your first row, grant them 40 Armor and 40 Magic Resist.

TFT_Augment_UrfsGambit.name: Urf's Gambit
TFT_Augment_UrfsGambit.description: If you win your next player combat, gain a Spatula. If you lose, gain a Frying Pan. Gain a component anvil and 6 gold now.

TFT6_Augment_BinaryAirdrop.name: Binary Airdrop
TFT6_Augment_BinaryAirdrop.description: Combat start: Champions holding 2 items gain a random 3rd completed item. Gain 2 random component now.

TFT_Augment_ChallengerDash.name: Precision and Grace
TFT_Augment_ChallengerDash.description: At the start of combat and on takedown, allies dash to their next target and gain 25% Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

TFT10_Augment_CrashTestDummies.name: Crash Test Dummies
TFT10_Augment_CrashTestDummies.description: Gain 2 Training Dummies. Combat start: Your Training Dummies launch themselves towards a group of enemies and Stun them for 1.25 seconds.

TFT6_Augment_BandOfThieves2.name: Band of Thieves II
TFT6_Augment_BandOfThieves2.description: Gain 2 Thief's Gloves. After 8 player combats, gain another.

TFT_Augment_MinMaxer.name: Min-Max
TFT_Augment_MinMaxer.description:
Gain a Golden Item Remover and 4 random components.

Golden Item Remover is a Magnetic Remover with infinite uses.

TFT6_Augment_MakeshiftArmor1.name: Makeshift Armor I
TFT6_Augment_MakeshiftArmor1.description: Allies without items equipped gain 30 Armor and Magic Resist.

TFT6_Augment_MakeshiftArmor2.name: Makeshift Armor II
TFT6_Augment_MakeshiftArmor2.description: Allies without items equipped gain 45 Armor and Magic Resist.

TFT_Augment_MoneyMonsoon.name: Money Monsoon
TFT_Augment_MoneyMonsoon.description: Gain 7 gold now and every round for the rest of the game.

TFT_Augment_LuxurySubscription.name: Luxury Subscription
TFT_Augment_LuxurySubscription.description:
Gain a package containing a 5-cost champion, a 2-star 1-cost champion, and 5 gold.

At the start of the next 2 stages, gain the package again.

TFT_Augment_ComebackStory.name: Comeback Story
TFT_Augment_ComebackStory.description: Your team gains 4 Health and 0.4% Attack Speed per missing player Health.

TFT_Augment_GrowthMindset.name: Growth Mindset
TFT_Augment_GrowthMindset.description: Gain 36 XP. Buying XP costs 3 gold instead of 4.

TFT6_Augment_BandOfThieves2Plus.name: Band of Thieves II+
TFT6_Augment_BandOfThieves2Plus.description: Gain 2 Thief's Gloves. After 6 player combats, gain another.

TFT6_Augment_BandOfThieves2PlusPlus.name: Band of Thieves II++
TFT6_Augment_BandOfThieves2PlusPlus.description: Gain 2 Thief's Gloves. After 3 player combats, gain another.

TFT_Augment_PrismaticDestinyPlus.name: Prismatic Destiny+
TFT_Augment_PrismaticDestinyPlus.description: Gain a random Prismatic Augment and 10 gold.

TFT9_Augment_Legend_HighEndSector.name: Shopping Spree
TFT9_Augment_Legend_HighEndSector.description: When you level up, gain a number of free shop refreshes equal to your level+1. Gain 2 gold.

TFT_Augment_SeraphimsStaff.name: Seraphim's Staff
TFT_Augment_SeraphimsStaff.description: Gain an Archangel's Staff. Archangel's Staff grants 2 additional Mana Regen if its holder has 90% or more Ability Power.

TFT_Augment_TraitTreePlus.name: The Trait Tree+
TFT_Augment_TraitTreePlus.description: Gain 3 random Emblems, a Reforger, and 12 gold.

TFT_Augment_SpreadingRootsPlus.name: Spreading Roots+
TFT_Augment_SpreadingRootsPlus.description: Gain 2 random Emblems, a Reforger, and 4 gold.

TFT6_Augment_Traitless2.name: Built Different
