TFT6_Augment_Traitless2.description: Your allies with no Traits active gain 250-550 Health and 45-75% Attack Speed (based on current Stage).

TFT6_Augment_VerdantVeil.name: Verdant Veil
TFT6_Augment_VerdantVeil.description: Your units are immune to crowd control effects for the first 20 seconds of combat and gain 15% bonus Attack Speed.

TFT7_Augment_AssassinEmblem2.name: Assassin Crown
TFT7_Augment_AssassinEmblem2.description: Gain an Assassin Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Rengar.

TFT7_Augment_CavalierEmblem.name: Cavalier Crest
TFT7_Augment_CavalierEmblem.description: Gain a Cavalier Emblem and a Sejuani.

TFT7_Augment_CavalierEmblem2.name: Cavalier Crown
TFT7_Augment_CavalierEmblem2.description: Gain a Cavalier Emblem, a Spirit Visage, and a Nunu.

TFT7_Augment_GuildEmblem.name: Guild Crest
TFT7_Augment_GuildEmblem.description: Gain a Guild Emblem and a Twitch.

TFT7_Augment_GuildEmblem2.name: Guild Crown
TFT7_Augment_GuildEmblem2.description: Gain a Guild Emblem, a Protector's Vow, and a Twitch.

TFT7_Augment_MirageEmblem.name: Mirage Crest
TFT7_Augment_MirageEmblem.description: Gain a Mirage Emblem and a Nunu.

TFT7_Augment_MirageEmblem2.name: Mirage Crown
TFT7_Augment_MirageEmblem2.description: Gain a Mirage Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Nunu.

TFT7_Augment_BruiserEmblem.name: Bruiser Crest
TFT7_Augment_BruiserEmblem.description: Gain a Bruiser Emblem and a Jax.

TFT7_Augment_BruiserEmblem2.name: Bruiser Crown
TFT7_Augment_BruiserEmblem2.description: Gain a Bruiser Emblem, a Spirit Visage, and a Sylas.

TFT7_Augment_SwiftshotEmblem.name: Swiftshot Crest
TFT7_Augment_SwiftshotEmblem.description: Gain a Swiftshot Emblem and a Twitch.

TFT7_Augment_SwiftshotEmblem2.name: Swiftshot Crown
TFT7_Augment_SwiftshotEmblem2.description: Gain a Swiftshot Emblem, a Guinsoo's Rageblade, and a Varus.

TFT7_Augment_TempestEmblem.name: Tempest Crest
TFT7_Augment_TempestEmblem.description: Gain a Tempest Emblem and a Qiyana.

TFT7_Augment_TempestEmblem2.name: Tempest Crown
TFT7_Augment_TempestEmblem2.description: Gain a Tempest Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Lee Sin.

TFT7_Augment_EvokerEmblem.name: Evoker Crest
TFT7_Augment_EvokerEmblem.description: Gain an Evoker Emblem and a Zyra.

TFT7_Augment_EvokerEmblem2.name: Evoker Crown
TFT7_Augment_EvokerEmblem2.description: Gain an Evoker Emblem, a Spear of Shojin, and a Seraphine.

TFT7_Augment_ShimmerscaleEmblem.name: Shimmerscale Crest
TFT7_Augment_ShimmerscaleEmblem.description: Gain a Shimmerscale Emblem and a Jax.

TFT7_Augment_CannoneerEmblem.name: Cannoneer Crest
TFT7_Augment_CannoneerEmblem.description: Gain a Cannoneer Emblem and an Aphelios.

TFT7_Augment_CannoneerEmblem2.name: Cannoneer Crown
TFT7_Augment_CannoneerEmblem2.description: Gain a Cannoneer Emblem, a Giant Slayer, and a Zeri.

TFT7_Augment_MageEmblem.name: Mage Crest
TFT7_Augment_MageEmblem.description: Gain a Mage Emblem and a Vladimir.

TFT7_Augment_MageEmblem2.name: Mage Crown
TFT7_Augment_MageEmblem2.description: Gain a Mage Emblem, a Spear of Shojin, and a Lux.

TFT7_Augment_DragonmancerEmblem2.name: Dragonmancer Crown
TFT7_Augment_DragonmancerEmblem2.description: Gain a Dragonmancer Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Lee Sin.

TFT7_Augment_GuardianEmblem.name: Guardian Crest
TFT7_Augment_GuardianEmblem.description: Gain a Guardian Emblem and a Zac.

TFT7_Augment_GuardianEmblem2.name: Guardian Crown
TFT7_Augment_GuardianEmblem2.description: Gain a Guardian Emblem, a Sunfire Cape, and a Rakan.

TFT7_Augment_CavalierForAllUnits.name: Cavalier Unity
TFT7_Augment_CavalierForAllUnits.description: The Cavalier trait grants its bonuses to all of your champions. This does not increase your number of Cavaliers. Gain a Rell.

TFT7_Augment_ThinkFast.name: Think Fast
TFT7_Augment_ThinkFast.description: Shop rerolls are free until the end of this round. Traits and other augments do not benefit from these free Shops. Gain 3 gold.

TFT7_Augment_SwiftshotPressTheAttack.name: Press the Attack
TFT7_Augment_SwiftshotPressTheAttack.description: Your Swiftshots' attacks apply a stack on their target for 5 seconds. Every third stack deals true damage equal to 4% of the target's maximum Health. Gain a Twitch.

TFT7_Augment_BruiserPersonalTraining.name: Personal Training
TFT7_Augment_BruiserPersonalTraining.description: At the end of combat, champions that started combat adjacent to Bruisers permanently gain 40 Health, increased by 20 if they survived. Gain a Jax.

TFT7_Augment_SacrificialPact.name: Cruel Pact
TFT7_Augment_SacrificialPact.description: Buying XP costs 5 player health instead of 4 gold. Heal 3 player health before each player combat. Gain 6 now.

TFT7_Augment_JadeEternalProtection.name: Eternal Protection
TFT7_Augment_JadeEternalProtection.description: When one of your Jade champions would die, the nearest Jade Statue protects them, sacrificing 70% of its max Health and transferring 150% of the sacrificed Health to the champion. Gain a Gnar.

TFT7_Augment_CavalierDevastatingCharge.name: Devastating Charge
TFT7_Augment_CavalierDevastatingCharge.description: Cavalier's first attack after charging deals 80 magic damage, increased by 1% for each Armor and Magic Resist they have. Gain a Rell.

TFT7_Augment_WarriorEmblem.name: Warrior Crest
TFT7_Augment_WarriorEmblem.description: Gain a Warrior Emblem and a Yone.

TFT7_Augment_WarriorEmblem2.name: Warrior Crown
TFT7_Augment_WarriorEmblem2.description: Gain a Warrior Emblem, a Giant Slayer, and a Yone.

TFT6_Augment_Distancing3.name: Exiles III
TFT6_Augment_Distancing3.description: Your champions that start combat with no adjacent champions gain a 50% max Health shield for 10 seconds.

TFT7_Augment_GuildLoot.name: Loot Master
TFT7_Augment_GuildLoot.description: Gain a random component every 3 player combats when you have at least Guild (3) active. Gain a Twitch.

TFT7_Augment_MageEssenceTheft.name: Essence Theft
TFT7_Augment_MageEssenceTheft.description: Mage's attacks drain 8 Mana from their target and gain 4 Mana. Gain a Lux.

TFT7_Augment_BruiserTitanicStrength.name: Titanic Strength
TFT7_Augment_BruiserTitanicStrength.description: Bruisers gain 1.5% of their Health as Attack Damage. Gain a Jax.

TFT7_Augment_MirageHallucinate.name: Hallucinate
TFT7_Augment_MirageHallucinate.description: Mirage champions take 90% less damage for the first 6 seconds of combat. Gain a Yone.

TFT7_Augment_ShapeshifterBeastsDen.name: Beast's Den
TFT7_Augment_ShapeshifterBeastsDen.description: Units that start combat next to Shapeshifters gain 25% Attack Speed and Movement Speed. Shapeshifters always gain this bonus. Gain a Gnar.

TFT7_Augment_GuardianHeroicPresence.name: Heroic Presence
TFT7_Augment_GuardianHeroicPresence.description: Every 2 seconds, Guardians taunt all enemies within range. Enemies that attack a Guardian's shield take magic damage equal to 7% of the shielded unit's max Health (up to once per second). Gain a Braum.

TFT7_Augment_CannoneerRicochet.name: Ricochet
TFT7_Augment_CannoneerRicochet.description: Cannoneer's cannon shots bounce once, dealing 40% less damage. Gain an Aphelios.

TFT7_Augment_RagewingScorch.name: Scorch
TFT7_Augment_RagewingScorch.description: Every 5th instance of Ragewing champion's damage deals 20% more damage and is converted to true damage. Gain a Senna.

TFT7_Augment_JadePenitence.name: Penitence
TFT7_Augment_JadePenitence.description: Jade Statue explosions deal 100% more damage. Enemies are disarmed for 2.5 seconds the first time they attack a Jade Statue or are damaged by a Jade Statue's explosion. Gain a Gnar.

TFT7_Augment_ShimmerscaleSpending.name: Pay to Win
TFT7_Augment_ShimmerscaleSpending.description: If you purchase a Shop reroll during Planning, champions holding a Shimmerscale Item and all Shimmerscale champions gain 35% damage when the next combat begins. Gain a Jax.

TFT7_Augment_LastStand.name: Last Stand
TFT7_Augment_LastStand.description: The first time you would be eliminated, you escape death and your team permanently gains 150 Health, 10 Armor and Magic Resist, and 10% Omnivamp.

TFT7_Augment_GuildGearUpgrades.name: Gear Upgrades
TFT7_Augment_GuildGearUpgrades.description: Guild champions holding an item gain 35 Armor and an additional 250% of their base Guild Bonus. Gain a Twitch.

TFT7_Augment_WarriorTiamat.name: Tiamat
TFT7_Augment_WarriorTiamat.description: Warrior's enhanced attacks deal 50% of their damage to enemies in a 1-hex area around their target. Gain a Yone.

TFT7_Augment_CannoneerHotShot.name: Hot Shot
TFT7_Augment_CannoneerHotShot.description: Cannoneer's cannon shots burn their targets, dealing 6% of the target's maximum Health as true damage over 2 seconds, and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn. Gain an Aphelios.

TFT7_Augment_RagewingTantrum.name: Tantrum
TFT7_Augment_RagewingTantrum.description: After casting their first Ability, Ragewings restore 100% of their maximum Rage. Gain a Senna.

TFT7_Augment_TempestEyeOfTheStorm.name: Eye of the Storm
TFT7_Augment_TempestEyeOfTheStorm.description: The unit in the center of the front row board gains 45 Ability Power, increased to 135 after Tempest's lightning strikes. Gain a Qiyana.

TFT7_Augment_DragonmancerEmblem.name: Dragonmancer Crest
TFT7_Augment_DragonmancerEmblem.description: Gain a Dragonmancer Emblem and a Kai'Sa.

TFT7_Augment_LagoonEmblem.name: Lagoon Crest
TFT7_Augment_LagoonEmblem.description: Gain a Lagoon Emblem and a Zac.

TFT7_Augment_LagoonEmblem2.name: Lagoon Crown
TFT7_Augment_LagoonEmblem2.description: Gain a Lagoon Emblem, a Spear of Shojin, and a Zeri.

TFT7_Augment_DarkflightEmblem.name: Darkflight Crest
TFT7_Augment_DarkflightEmblem.description: Gain a Darkflight Emblem and a Rell.

TFT7_Augment_DarkflightEmblem2.name: Darkflight Crown
TFT7_Augment_DarkflightEmblem2.description: Gain a Darkflight Emblem, a Titan's Resolve, and a Rengar.

TFT7_Augment_DragonImperialist.name: Dragon Imperialist
TFT7_Augment_DragonImperialist.description: If you only have 1 Dragon, Dragons execute enemies they damage who are below 18% Health. Gain a Nomsy.

TFT7_Augment_AgeOfDragons.name: Age of Dragons
TFT7_Augment_AgeOfDragons.description: If your team has 3+ Dragons, every 4th attack from a Dragon fires a blast that deals magic damage equal to 30% of the target's maximum Health. Gain a Nomsy, Zippy, and a Tier 4 Dragon.

TFT7_Augment_LagoonHighTide.name: High Tide
TFT7_Augment_LagoonHighTide.description: Until they cast 2 times, Lagoon champions attack 30% slower but gain 12 Mana per second. Gain a Kai'sa.

TFT7_Augment_DragonmancerInTraining.name: Hero-In-Training
TFT7_Augment_DragonmancerInTraining.description: The Dragonmancer nearest to the Dragonmancer Hero gains 66% of the Dragonmancer Trait's bonuses. Gain a Sett.

TFT7_Augment_DarkflightSoulSiphon.name: Soul Siphon
TFT7_Augment_DarkflightSoulSiphon.description: Darkflight champions benefit from the first-listed trait of a sacrificed champion. This does not increase the trait count for that trait. Gain an Aphelios.

TFT7_Augment_WhispersTerrify.name: Terrify
TFT7_Augment_WhispersTerrify.description: Your units take 15% less damage from enemies shrunken by Whisper champions. Gain a Sylas.

TFT7_Augment_ScalescornBaseCamp.name: Base Camp
TFT7_Augment_ScalescornBaseCamp.description: Scalescorns gain 7% damage each time they start combat in the same hex as last round, stacking up to 4 times. Gain a Lillia.

TFT7_Augment_AstralIntercosmicProtection.name: Protectors of the Cosmos
TFT7_Augment_AstralIntercosmicProtection.description: Combat start: Your team gains a 35 Health shield for every item component equipped on an Astral champion, including those that are part of a full item. Gain a Lux.

TFT7_Augment_LagoonOasis.name: Oasis
TFT7_Augment_LagoonOasis.description: Every 6 seconds, Lagoon champions remove all negative effects on themselves and heal for 18% of their missing Health. Gain a Zac.

TFT7_Augment_ScalescornEmblem.name: Scalescorn Crest
TFT7_Augment_ScalescornEmblem.description: Gain a Scalescorn Emblem and a Braum.

TFT7_Augment_ScalescornEmblem2.name: Scalescorn Crown
TFT7_Augment_ScalescornEmblem2.description: Gain a Scalescorn Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Diana.

TFT7_Augment_DragonmancerConference.name: Dragonmancer Conference
TFT7_Augment_DragonmancerConference.description: Every 2 rounds, a random Dragonmancer appears on your bench. Gain a Kai'Sa.

TFT7_Augment_DragonGoldCarry.name: Idas Touch
TFT7_Augment_DragonGoldCarry.description: Gain an Idas. Your strongest Idas becomes a Fighter. She now deals magic damage in a cone and can create gold.

TFT7_Augment_DarkflightZekes.name: Relic of the Past
TFT7_Augment_DarkflightZekes.description: Gain a special Darkflight Zeke's Herald from the past.

TFT7_Augment_DarkflightResurrect.name: Dark Resurrection
TFT7_Augment_DarkflightResurrect.description: The Darkflight sacrifice returns after 10 seconds of combat with 100% increased max Health, 75% Damage Amp, and 30% Attack Speed

TFT7_Augment_ScalescornRebel.name: Scalescorn Rebel
TFT7_Augment_ScalescornRebel.description: If you have exactly 1 Dragon it loses the effects of the Dragon trait and gains Scalescorn. It gains an additional 15% of the effects of Scalescorn. Gain a Lillia.

TFT7_Augment_NasusCarry.name: Soul Eater
TFT7_Augment_NasusCarry.description: Gain a Nasus. Your strongest Nasus becomes a Fighter. He now slams his staff on enemies, dealing physical damage. If this kills the enemy, Nasus gains permanent Attack Damage.

TFT7_Augment_VladimirCarry.name: Cosmic Hemomancy
TFT7_Augment_VladimirCarry.description: Gain a Vladimir. Your strongest Vladimir becomes a Caster. He no longer Heals, but gains 2 range and every fourth cast damages enemies in an area around his target. Enemies damaged lose Magic Resist.

TFT9_Augment_TiniestTitan.name: Tiniest Titan
TFT9_Augment_TiniestTitan.description: Gain 2 player Health and 1 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

TFT10_Augment_LittleBuddies_Set7.name: Little Buddies
TFT10_Augment_LittleBuddies_Set7.description: Your Tier-4 and Tier-5 champions gain 55 Health and 6% Attack Speed for every Tier-1 and Tier-2 champion on your board.

TFT9_Augment_WanderingTrainer.name: Wandering Trainer II
TFT9_Augment_WanderingTrainer.description: Gain a Training Dummy with 3 permanently attached Emblems. Gain 8 gold.

TFT11_Augment_WanderingTrainerGold.name: Wandering Trainer I
TFT11_Augment_WanderingTrainerGold.description: Gain a Training Dummy with 2 permanently attached Emblems. Gain 1 gold.

TFT_Augment_Trifecta1_Set7.name: Trifecta I
TFT_Augment_Trifecta1_Set7.description:
Gain 2 tier-3 champions.
Combat Start: 3 random tier-3 champions gain 220 Health and 20% Attack Speed.

TFT_Augment_Trifecta2_Set7.name: Trifecta II
TFT_Augment_Trifecta2_Set7.description:
Gain 3 tier-3 champions. Allies gain 5% Attack Speed.
Combat Start: 3 random tier-3 champions gain 300 Health and 25% Attack Speed.

TFT_Augment_Sponging.name: Sponging
TFT_Augment_Sponging.description: Combat start: Up to 6 champions with 1 or fewer items gain a copy of a random completed item from the nearest itemized ally.

TFT_Augment_Scavenger.name: Scavenger
TFT_Augment_Scavenger.description: The first 5 enemy champions that are killed each combat grant a champion on your team a temporary completed item.

TFT_Augment_TowerDefense.name: Tower Defense
TFT_Augment_TowerDefense.description: Gain a Training Dummy equipped with a random emblem that fires ranged attacks at enemies. It upgrades as the game goes on.

TFT_Augment_Kingslayer.name: Kingslayer
TFT_Augment_Kingslayer.description: Now and after every player combat, gain 1 gold. If you win against a player who had more health than you, gain 6 gold instead.

TFT_Augment_MaxCap.name: Max Cap
TFT_Augment_MaxCap.description: Your max level is 7. Gain 1 Tactician's Shield which increases your team size by +1, and 50 gold.

TFT_Augment_PairOfFours_Set7.name: Pair of Fours
TFT_Augment_PairOfFours_Set7.description: If your team has exactly 2 tier-4 champions, they each gain 374 Health and 24.4% Attack Speed. Gain a random tier-4 champion.

TFT_Augment_SatedSpellweaver.name: Sated Spellweaver
TFT_Augment_SatedSpellweaver.description: After casting an Ability, champions gain 15% Omnivamp for 3 seconds. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 500 Health.

TFT_Augment_BeggarsCanBeChoosers.name: Beggars Can Be Choosers
TFT_Augment_BeggarsCanBeChoosers.description: You get +3 Augment rerolls for all other augment choices. Gain 7 gold.
